content.text: Le ncwadi yamaculo edijithali yenziwe ngothando ukuze kuzukiswe uThixo nokomeleza iBandla laKhe.
Yenziwe yaze yagcinwa ngu Thandolwethu Njili, elungiselela i-African Methodist Episcopal Church.

‚Äú...nokuba nenza nayiphi na into, zenzeleni uzuko lukaThixo izinto zonke.‚Äù
‚Äî KwabaseKorinte 1, 10:31

lines: O se boloke, O se boloke setjhaba sa heso,
Setjhaba sa South Afrika - South Afrika.
Uit die blou van onse hemel,
Uit die diepte van ons see,
Sounds the call to come together,
Let us live and strive for freedom,

content.text: Phambi kokuba avakalise iculo lokuvula Umfundisi wophakama ngokubekekileyo afunde ngokulandelana nabantu kulemigca ilandelayo yezibhalo ezingcwele:‚Äî
Ndavuya bakuthi kum masiye endlwini ye Nkosi, inyawo zetu ziyakuma ngaphakathi kwamasango akho Jerusalem.
Ngenxa yokuba usuku olunye kweyakho iminquba lungaphezulu kwentsuku ezingamawaka.
Ndingaxolela kanye ukuba ngumgcini mnyango endlwini yo Thixo wam endaweni yokuhlala kwintente zenkohlakalo.
Ngenxa yendlu ye Nkosi u Thixo wethu ndiyakufuna konke okulungileyo.
Abo batyalekayo endlwini ye Nkosi bayakufumaneka betyatyambile eminqubeni yo Thixo wethu.
Banethamsanqa abo bahlala endlwini yakho. Nkosi ndiyayi thanda indawo yakho ohlala kuyo apho lonke udumo lwakho lukhona.
Nkosi ndiyayi thanda indawo yakho ohlala kuyo apho lonke udumo lwakho lukhona.
Culelani I Nkosi iculo elitsha ngokuba yenze izinto eziyimimangaliso, yenzani ingxolo ngokugcobela e Nkosini, mhlaba wonke, nicule nemibedesho.
Ngenxa yokuba iNkosi iseNdaweni yaYo eNgcwele, wonke umhlaba mawuthi cwaka phambi kwayo.
Makathi amazwi omlomo wam, nengcinga zent-liziyo yam zamkeleke ebusweni bakho Nkosi, mandla am noMkhululi wam.

Bazalwana abathandiweyo isibhalo esingcwele, siyasiyala kwindawo nge ndawo, ukuba masivume sixele izono zethu ezininzi, nokukhohlakala kwethu nokuba singahanahanisi sizifihle ebusweni bo Thixo u Bawo wethu osezulwini, koko sizivume ngentliziyo elulamileyo nethobekileyo, nelilayo,

nevayo, ukuze sizuze ukuxolelwa kwazo ngabo ububele bakhe netaru lakhe elingenambaliso. Esinge sisiti ngokukodwa xa sidibene si hlangane ndawonye, sinikele imibulelo yethu ngoncedo esilwamkeleyo ezandleni zakhe, ngokunikela indumiso ezifanelekileyo, nangokuphulaphula ilizwi lakhe elingcwele, nokucela ezozinto ziyimfanelo, zilungele umzimba nomphefumo. Ngako oko ndiyanithandaza ndiniyale nonke nina nikhoyo apha, ukuba manindipheleke ngentliziyo engcwengileyo nelizwielilulamileyo, siye esihlalweni sofefe lwase zulwini nisithi emva kwam.

Bawo onamandla onke, onofefe oluphezu konke, siphosisile salahlekana nendlela zakho njengezimvu ezilahlekileyo. Sigqitile ngokulandela amaqinga nenkanuko zentliziyo zethu. Sonile ngakuyo imithetho yakho engcwele. Siyekile ezonto esinge sizenze, senza ezonto esingesingazenzi; akukho nokuphila kuthi. Kodwa wena Nkosi uze wenze ngetaru kuthi baphosisi abantliziyo zilusizi. Banyamezele Thixo abo baxela iziphoso zabo. Philisa abo baguqukayo; njengokuthembisa kwako oku shunyayelwa ebantwini, ngo Krestu Yesu i-Nkosi yethu. Uze uthi Bawo olufefe luphezu konke,
usiphe ngenxa yakhe okukuba sithi emveni kwakaloku nje sihlale intlalo ebhedeshekileyo, nelungileyo nebuncathu, kuze kudunyiswe igama lakho. Amen.

Thixo onamandla onke, Bawo wethu wase mazulwini, othe ngofefe lwakho olukhulu wathembisa uxolelo lwezono kubo bonke abaguqukayo ngentliziyo nangokukolwa babuyele kuwe. Yiba netaru phezu kwethu usixolele, usisindise kuzo zonke izono zethu. Someleze usikuthazele kuko konke ukulunga; ude usise kubo ubom obungunaphakade, ngaye uYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.
Wawathetha u-Thixo lamazwi esithi: Mna ndingu Yehova U-Thixo wakho okukhuphileyo elizweni lase Jiphethe, endlwini yobukhoboka; akusayikuba na Thixo bambi ngaphandle kwam.
Nkosi siphathe ngetaru! Yenza ukuba intliziyo zethu ziwubambe lomthetho.

Akuyi kuzenzela umfanekiso oqingqiweyo, nanye into efana nesezulwini phezulu nesemhlabeni phantsi apha nesemanzini phantsi komhlaba; akuyi kuthoba pambi kwazo; akuyi kuzikhonza kanjalo; ngokuba mna Yehova, u Thixo wakho, ndingu Thixo onekhwele, ndiyohlwayela inkohlakalo yoyise phezu kwabantwana, phezu kwesesithathu, naphezu kwesesizukulwana sabandithiyayo; ndaye ndiwenzela ububele amawaka abandithandayo, nabayigcinayo imiyalelo yam.
Nkosi, siphathe ngetaru! Yenza ukuba intliziyo zethu ziwubambe lomthetho.
Akuyi kufumana ulibize igama lika Yehova u Thixo wakho, ngokuba u Yehova engayikumyeka angabi natyala lowo ufumana elibiza igama lakhe.
Nkosi, siphathe ngetaru! Yenza ukuba intliziyo zethu ziwubambe lomthetho.

Khumbula umhla we Sabatha, ukuba uwenze ngcwele. Wosebenza imihla ibe mithandathu uwenze wonke umsebenzi wakho; kodwa umhla wesixhenxe uyi Sabatha ka Yehova, u Thixo wakho; akuyikwenza namnye umsebenzi ngawo, kwa wena, nonyana wakho nentombi yakho, nesicaka sakho, nesicakakazi sakho, nenkomo zakho nowase mzini ophakathi kwamasango akho; ngokuba ngemihla emithandathu wenza u Yehova izulu nomhlaba, nolwandle, nako konke okukuzo, waza wapumla ngomhla wesixhenxe, ngoko wawuthamsanqelisa u Yehova umhla wesixhenxe, wawenza ngcwele.
Ndisondela kuwe, Thixo wami, Nayiph' int' engaba, Sendleleni, Ndomana ukuthi, Ndisondela kuwe, Thixo wami,
Nkosi siphathe ngetaru! Yenza ukuba intliziyo zethu ziwubambe lomthetho.
Beka u-Yihlo no nyoko, ukuze imihla yakho yolulwe elizweni oliphiweyo ngu Yehova u-Thixo wakho.
Nkosi siphathe ngetaru! Yenza ukuba intliziyo zethu ziwubambe lomthetho.
Nkosi siphathe ngetaru! Yenza ukuba intliziyo zethu ziwubambe lomthetho.
Nkosi siphathe ngetaru! Yenza ukuba intliziyo zethu ziwubambe lomthetho.
Nkosi siphathe ngetaru! Yenza ukuba intliziyo zethu ziwubambe lomthetho.
Uze unganqhini ubunqhina abubuxeki ngommelwane wakho.
Nkosi siphathe ngetaru! Yenza ukuba intliziyo zethu ziwubambe lomthetho.
Akuyi kunqwenela indlu yommelwane wako, isicaka sake, nesicakakazi sake, nenkabi yakhe, nehashe lakhe, nanye into eyeyommelwane wakho.
Wena Liwa laphakade, warazulelwa mna, Kuze Ndizimele Kuwe, Msindisi 'Oyingcwele.

Yivani okuthethwayo ngu Msindisi wethu: Uyakumthanda u Yehova u Thixo wakho, ngayo yonke intliziyo yakho, nangawo wonke umphefumlo wakho, nangayo yonke ingqondo yakho; lo ngowokuqala nowona umkhulu umyalelo. Nowesibini ofana nawo: Uyakumthanda ummelwane wakho njengokuzithanda kwakho. Kulemiyalelo mibini kuxhomekeke wonke umthetho nabaprofite.
Udumiso malubeko kuye u Yise, nakuye u Nyana, nakuye u Moya oyingcwele..........
Njengokuba kube kunjalo kwasekuqaleni kunjalo kaloku nje kuya kumana kuba njalo, kude kube ngunaphakade Amen.
2. Kocula i Kwayala abantu behleli phantsi.
Kwenziwe isi-vumo se nkolo yabapostile abantu bemi:‚Äî

Ndiyakholwa ku Thixo u Yise onamandla onke, u Mdali wezulu nomhlaba, Naku Yesu Krestu, U Nyana wakhe emnye i Nkosi yethu owakawulwa ngo-Moya Oyingcwele, wazalwa yintombi U Mariya, weva ubunzima phantsi ko Pontyusi Pilati; Wabethelwa emnqamlezweni, wafa wangcwatywa; Wehlela ehadesi; Uthe ngomhla wesithathu wabuya wavuka ekufeni: Wenyuka waya ezulwini; apho ahleli kona Ngase kunene ko Thixo, u Yise onamandla onke. Woda avele kona aze kugweba abahleliyo nabafileyo. Ndiyakholwa ku Moya Oyingcwele, nayi Remente engcwele ekulo lonke ilizwe, nabubudlelane babangcwele, nakukuxolelwa kwezono; nakukuvuka komzimba ekufeni; nabubomi obungunaphakade. Amen.

Elandelayo ingenziwa endaweni ye mithetho elishumi, mhlawumbi kunye nayo. Apho kuko i Kwayala angaculwa u Siyakudumisa, kodwa ukuba abantu abakwazi ukumcula angafundwa ngu Mfundisi nabantu ngokulandelelana kwemigca.
Siyakudumisa Thixo! Sikuvuma ukuba ungu Yehova.
Umhlaba wonke ubedesha wena; u Yise ongunaphakade.
Zonke ingelosi zimemeza kuwe: Kwa nezulu nawo onke amandla akulo.
Ikerubime ne Serufime: zimana zimemeza kuwe.
Uyingcwele, Uyingcwele, Uyingcwele: Yehova Thixo wemikhosi.
Izulu lizele kwa nomhlaba bubukhulu bobungcwalisa bako.
I Remente Engcwele kulo lonke ilizwe: iyakudumisa.
Kwano Moya oyi Ngcwele: U Monwabisi.
Wena ungu Nyana Ongunaphakade: wo Yihlo.
Uthe wena wakunyula umsebenzi wokusindisa abantu akwasidela isizalo sentombi.
Uthe wakuba weyisile ubukhali bokufa: wavulela bonke abakholwayo ubukumkani beZulu.
Wena uhleli ngase kunene ku Thixo: ebungcwaliseni bo Yihlo.
Siyakholwa ukuba woza ube ngumgwebi wethu
Siyakuthandaza ngoko siza izicaka zakho: ozithengileyo ngegazi lakho elinqabileyo.
Zenze ukuba zibhalwe ndawonye nabangcwele bakho: ebungcwaliseni obungunaphakade.
Nkosi, sindisa abantu bakho: uthamsanqelise ilifa lakho
Thina imihla nge mihla: sikwenza mkhulu wena.
Sihlala sibedesha igama lakho: kude kube ngunaphakade.
Sincede Nkosi: usilondoloze ngalemini singabi nasono.
Nkosi itaru lakho malihle phezu kwethu: njengokuba ithemba lethu likuwe.

lines: Umphefumlo wam uyayibonga i-Nkosi: nomoya wam ugcobile ngo Thixo u Msindisi wam.
Ngokuba kaloku zonke izizukulwana: ziyakuthi ndinethamsanqa.
Ngokuba wandenzela into ezinkulu u Somandla: lingcwele igama lakhe.
Ufefe lwakhe lupezu kwabo bamoyikayo: kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana.
Wenzile amandla ngengalo yakhe: Ubachithile abanerantshi ekucingeni kwentliziyo zabo.
Iziphathamandla uziwisile ezihlalweni zazo: wabaphakamisa abaphantsi.
Abalambileyo ubahluthisile ngento ezilungileyo: nezityebi wazindulula zilambile.
Umxhasile u-Sirayeli isicaka sakhe, ngokukhumbula ufefe lwakhe (njengokuba ethethile kobawo) ku Abraham na kwinzalo yakhe kude kube ngunaphakade.
Udumiso malubekho kuye u-Yise, nakuye u-Nyana, nakuye u-Moya Oyingcwele.
Njengokuba kube kunjalo kwasekuqaleni kunjalo nakaloku nje, Kwaye kuyakuba njalo: kude kube nguna phakade. AMEN.

content.text: BONKE BEGUQILE KOLANDELA LEMITHANDAZO UMFUNDISI AKHOKELE NGOKUTHI.
Thixo ekuphuma kuye yonke iminqweno engcwele, nawo onke amacebo alungileyo, kwanemisebenzi yobulungisa.

Nika izicaka zakho oloxolo olungenakunikwa lilizwe, ukuze kuthi kanjalo ngawe sikhuselwe ukuyihlonipha imithetho yakho, ukuze kuthi kunjalo ngawe sikhuselwe ekuzoyikeni intshaba zethu, silidlulise ixesha lethu ekuphumleni, nasekuxoleni, ngenxa ka Yesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.

Nkosi Bawo wethu wasezulwini esithe ngamandla obuso Mandla bakho salondolozwa ngalemini: othe ngenceba yakho enkulu wasihlanganisela kuzo zonke inxwaleko, nengozi zobusuku ngenxa yothando lokuphela ko Nyana ngenxa ka Yesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.

Nkosi Bawo wethu wasezulwini, ophakamileyo, nonamandla onke, ongu Mlawuli waphakade, othi use Tronini yakho ubone bonke abemi bomhlaba, siyakubongoza ngokukhulu, nange ntliziyo epheleleyo, ukuba uthi ngobubele bakho, ukangele usikelele izicaka zakho abalawuli bo mbuso Bachumise ngofefe lo Moya wakho Oyingcwele, ngoko kuze bathi ngamaxesha onke, batyekele
entandweni yakho bahambe nase ndleleni yakho; bahlale ixesha elide, ukuze kuthi ukugqibela emveni kobubomi, bazuze uvuyo, nenyweba engunaphakade, ngaye uYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. AMEN.

Thixo ongu Somandla waphakade eziphuma kuye zonke izipho ezilungileyo nezifezekileyo, hlisela phezu kwe Bishop zethu, naphezu kwa bafundisi bethu, kwana phezu kwamabandla abawaphetheyo, u Moya ophilisayo kwanofefe lwakho, ukuze bakukholise ngokwenene, bagalele ngombete, wethamsanqa lakho, yenza oku Nkosi, ngenxa ye gama le Nkosi Yethu, uYesu Krestu. Amen.

Thixo Mdali nomlondolozi wabo bonke abantu, siyakubongoza ngokululamileyo, ngazo zonke intlobontlobo zabantu, ukuba waneliswe kukuzazisa indlela zakho kubo, kwanempiliso yakho esindisayo kuzo zonke intlanga. Ngokukhulu sithandazela ibandla lakho elingcwele, elikulo lonke elimiweyo ukuba likhokelwe lilawulwe ngu Moya wakho; nokuba bathi bonke abathi bangama Krestu,
bakhokelelwe endleleni yenyaniso, babambe ukholo ngobunye bo Moya, nangentambo yo Xolo.

Ukugqiba siyaleza kuwe bonke ababandezelekileyo, nabacinezelekileyo emimoyeni yabo, nasemizimbeni yabo, nasezimfuyweni zabo okokuba ubatutuzele, ubakulule ngokwemfuneko zabo ngabanye, ubanike unyamezelo ekuveni kwabo intlungu, nangokubakhupha kwezo mbandezelo abakuzo. Sikubongoza ukuba ukwenze oku ngenxa ka Yesu Krestu iNkosi yethu. Amen.
Thixo Somandla, Yise wazo zonke izibele thina zicaka zakho ezingafanelekileyo, sinikela imithandazo ethobekileyo kunye nentliziyo ngenxa yokulunga kwakho, nobubele bakho kuthi, nakubo bonke abantu.

Siyakudumisa ngokudalwa kwethu, nangawo onke amathamsanqa obubomi kodwa ngaphezu kwazo zonke ezi, luthando lwakho, olungenambaliso ekukhululweni kwelimiweyo yi Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, namathuba ofefe, nangethemba lobungcwalisa.
Siyakubongoza ukuba usiphe ukhanyiselo olufezekileyo lwenceba zakho ukuze intliziyo zethu zibe nokukubulela okungazenzisiyo, sibe nako

nokulubonakalisa udumo lwakho kungengamilomo yodwa, kodwa nangobomi bethu, ngokuzinikela enkonzweni yakho, nangokuhamba emehlweni akho ngobungcwele, nangobulungisa, yonke imihla yethu ngaye uYesu Krestu iNkosi yethu: kuye, nakuwe naku Moya Oyingcwele, makubekho imbeko nozuko, kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.

Ndiyakholwa ku Thixo u Yise onamandla onke, u Mdali wezulu nomhlaba, Naku Yesu Krestu, u Nyana wakhe emnye, iNkosi yethu; owakhawulwa ngo Moya Oyingcwele Wazalwa yintombi u Mariya; weva ubunzima phantsi ko Ponyusi Pilati; wabethelwa emnqamlezweni, wafa wancwatywa. wehlela ehadisi; uthe ngomhla wesithathu wabuya wavuka ekufeni; Wenyuka waya ezulwini; Apho ahleli khona ngasekunene ko Thixo u Yise Onamandla onke; Wode avele khona aze kugweba abahleliyo nabafileyo.
Ndiyakholwa ku Moya Oyingcwele; Nayi Remente engcwele ekulo lonke ilizwe; Nabubudlelane babangcwele; Nakukuxolelwa kwezono; Nakuku
vuka komzimba ekufeni; Nabubomi obungunaphakade. Amen.
Kwanga kungabakho kuni nonke ufefe lwe Nkosi yethu uYesu Krestu nothando luka Thixo, nobudlelane bo Moya Oyi-ngcwele, kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
Mabathi bonke abantu abadala, kunye nabazali babantwana abazekuphehlelelwa bazikhethele olona hlobo bathanda lona.
KUKUNTYWILISELWA, UKUTSHIZWA, NOKUGALELWA. KODWA UMNTU MAKANGAPINDWA KABINI UKUPHEHLELELWA. UKUBA KUKHO OTHE WAYENZA LONTO ESAZI UYAKUNQUNYANYISWA OKANYE AMISWE YI KOMFA NGOKUBONA KWAYO.
2. ASIYIKUBEKA TYALA NANGAYIPHINA INDLELA YOKUPHEHLELELA NOKUNGCWATYWA KWABAFILEYO
Umfundisi uyakuza ngaphambili apho koba kuko amanzi angcwengileyo, enze lamazwi.

Bathandwa! Njengokuba abantu bonke bamithelwe esonweni, baza bazalelwa kwakuso, uthi no Msindisi wethu uYesu Krestu: Akungengeni mntu ebukumkanini buka Thixo ukuba akazalwanga ngamanzi nango Moya, Oyingcwele; Ndiyaniyala ukuba nibize ku Thixo uYise ngayo iNkosi yethu uYesu Krestu, ukuze athi ngobubele bakhe obukulu aphe lomntwana abengenako ngokuvela okokuba angabaptizeshwa ngamanzi odwa, kodwa kube nango Moya Oyingcwele, aze angeniswe e Rementeni ka Krestu enziwe ilungu eliphilileyo kuyo.

Thixo onamandla, ongunaphakade, owamlondolozayo u Nowa nosapho lwake enqanaweni ngofefe lwakho olukhulu bangabhubhi ngamanzi owathi kanjalo walukhokela usapho luka Sirayeli abantu bakho, waluweza ulwandle olubomvu, usalatisela ke ngoko ubaptizesho lwakho olungcwele; wena wayahlulela amanzi lenkonzo yakho engcwele, ngokubaptizeshwa ko Nyana wakho othandiweyo, uYesu Krestu, emlanjeni oyi Yoredane; Siyakuthandaza wena obubele bungenamlinganiso sithi,

mkhangele lomntwana ngofefe, mhlambe, umngcwalise ngo Moya Oyingcwele, aze athi ekhululwe engqumbeni yakho, angeniswe e Rementeni ka Krestu, aqine elukholweni, avuye ngethemba endele eluthandweni, enje njalo ukudlula emazeni alomhlaba okhathazayo, ade eze kufika ezweni lobomi obungaphel' endawo, ahlale khona nawe; kude kube ngunaphakade; ngaye u Krestu i-Nkosi yethu Amen.
Thixo onetaru! Siyakucela ukuba ubungcwabe ubuntu obudala kulomntwana, kuvele ubuntu obutsha kuye. Amen.
Zibulale zonke izimvo zenyama kuye, kuphile kukhule konke oko Moya Oyingcwele. Amen.
Mnike amandla okumeyisa ngomgcobo u sathana, nomhlaba nenyama. Amen.

Makathi osukuba simnikela kuwe ngobufundisi nobukhonzi bethu amkele amalungelo ase zulwini, nomvuzo ongunaphakade; ngalo ufefe lwakho Nkosi Thixo! Mhlekazi ohleliyo, ozilawula zonke izinto ngobukhosi, kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
Thixo onamandla onke, ongunaphakade o-Nyana wakho othandiweyo uYesu Krestu waphalaza ecaleni lakhe amanzi ne gazi ukuze sixolelwe izono zethu: owathi kanjalo wabanika umthetho

aba Disipile bakhe, wokuba bazifundise zonke izizwe, bazibaptizeshe egameni lo Yise, nelo Nyana, nelo Moya Oyingcwele, Siyakuthandaza, phulaphula umthandazo walentlanganiso, wangcwalise lamanzi wenze okokuba lomntwana ozakubaptizeshwa, amkele inzalseko yofefe lwakho. ngaye u Yesu Krestu-i-Nkosi yethu. Amen.

Njengokuba, bathandwa, nizise lomntwana elubaptizeshweni lobu Krestu, nifanele ke ngoko ukukhumbula ukuba yimfanelo yenu ukuba nikhangele ukuba lomntwana afundiswe, ngako kodwa ukuba, abenako ukufunda, imvelo nenjongo yale nkonzo engcwele; nokokuba ezizinto azazi kakuhle nimyalele ukuba aziqonde izi Bhalo, nokukonza ilizwi lika Thixo phambi kwabantu nangasese. Kakhulu nimfundise isivumo sokholo lwaba Postile, nomthandazo we-Nkosi, ne-Mithetho elishumi, nencwadi yo Mbuzo; nazo zonke ezinye izinto ezo um-Krestu afanele ukuzazi nokukholwa zizo, ukuze umphefumlo wakhe uphile kakuhle. Kwakhona niyiqonde indawo yokuba lomntwana ondliwe kakuhle, aphile ngokuthandaza ngesiko elifanele ubu Krestu; nikhumbule yonke imihla ukuba ubaptizesho lusibonisa umsebenzi wethu, wokuba

sifuze u Krestu u Mkhululi wethu, senziwe sibe njengaye: sithi njengokuba wafayo wabuya wavuka ngenxa yethu, nathi sibaptizeshiweyo sife ngakuso isono, sivukele ebulungiseni sibe nokuhlala sizoyisa zonke inkanuko ezikhohlakeleyo, sibe nako imihla ngemihla ukuhamba ebulungiseni, nasekuhloneleni u Thixo. Niyazibopha na ke ngokungcwele ukuba niyakuzifeza ezizinto kangangoko ninako i-Nkosi ingumncedi wenu?
BAYAKUTHI ABANTU BEME. UKUZE UMFUNDISI ENJENJE:
Waphulaphuleni amazwi abhaliweyo ngu Maraki Ongcwele e Vangelini yakhe kwisahluko seshumi kwisahlukwana seshumi elinesithathu.

Baye bezisa abantwana ku Krestu ukuba abachukumise basuke abafundi babathethisa abo babazisayo. Ke kaloku ekubonile oku u Yesu wacaphuka. wathi kubo; bavumeleni abantwana beze kum, othe akabamkela ubukumkani buka Thixo njengomntwana akasayi kungena kubo. Waza wabawola, wazibeka izandla phezu kwabo wabasikelela.
UMNTWANA NGE ZANDLA ZAKHE ABHEKISE KUBA HLOBO BOMNTWANA ATHI:
Aze ke akuba elibizile igama emva kwabo, umfundisi uyakuthi amtshize okanye amgalele, okanye amntywilisele emanzini esithi.
Bani, Ndiyakubaptizesha egameni lo Yise, nelo Nyana, nelo Moya Oyingcwele. Amen.

Bawo wethu wasezulwini! Maliphathwe ngobungcwele igama lakho, Ubukumkani bakho mabufike. Intando yakho mayenziwe emhlabeni. Njenkuba isenziwa ezulwini. Mawusiphe namhla-nje isonka sethu semihla ngemihla. Usixolele izono zethu. Njengokuba nathi sixolela abo basonayo thina. Ungasingenisi ekuhendweni; Sisindise enkohlakalweni. Ngokuba ubukumkani bubobakho, Namandla engawakho, Nobungcwalisa bubobakho, kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
Umfundisi uyakusebenzisa lamazwi alandelayo, okanye nawapina afana nawo, athi:

Bathandwa! Ngokuba abantu bonke bamithelwe esonweni, bazalelwa kuso kanti ke okuzelwe yinyama kuyi nyama; abo basenyameni ke bangemkholisi u Thixo, kuba behleli esonweni, besenza izigqitho ezininzi kanti u Msindisi wethu u Krestu uthi: Akungengene mntu ebukumkanini buka Thixo, ukuba akazalwanga nga manzi nango Moya Oyingcwele. Ndiyaniyala ukuba nibize ku Thixo ongu Yise, ngayo i Nkosi yethu, u Yesu Krestu, ukuze athi ngobubele bakhe obukhulu abaphe ababantu oko bangebinako ngokuvela okokuba bangabaptizeshwa ngamanzi odwa, kodwa nango Moya Oyingcwele, baze bangeniswe e Rementeni ka Krestu, benziwe amalungu aphilileyo kuyo.
Thixo onamandla onke, ohlala uhleli! Ungu Msizi wabo bonke abasweleyo no-Mncedi wabo bonke ababalekela kuwe, obubomi babakholwayo,

novuko olungcwele siyakucela ukuba ubaxolele izono zabo bamkele ufefe lokuzalwa ngakumbi. Bamkele, Nkosi, njengokuba ute ngaye u-Nyana wakho otandiweyo wasibeka ngedinga lokuthi: Celani niyakuphiwa, funani niyakufumana; nqonqozani niyakuvulelwa. Siphe thina sicelayo, sifumane thina sifunayo, sivulelwe thina sinqonqozayo; ukuze ababantu bazuze ithamsanqa, bahlanjululwe ngokwasezulwini bade bangene ebukumkanini bakho obungu naphakade, obo usithembise ngabo ngo Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu. Amen.

Thixo Somandla onke, ongunaphakade, Bawo wasezulwini, sinikela kuwe imibulelo ethobekileyo, kuba uvumile ukusibizela ekwaziweni kofefe lwakho, nokuba sikholwe nguwe. Yandisa kuthi okukwazi, uluqinisele kuthi olukholo ngamaxesha onke Banike u Moya wakho Oyingcwele aba bantu; ukuze bazalwe ngokutsha benziwe indlamafa zosindiso olungunaphakade.
Ngayo i-Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu, ehleliyo iphethe kunye nawe no Moya Oyingcwele ngoku kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
BOTHI APHA ABANTU BONKE BEME UMFUNDISI ATHETHE ATHI:
Ongcwele e Vangelini yakhe kwisahluko sesithathu, kuqala kwisahlukwana sokuqala:‚Äî

Kwaye kuko umntu wakuba Farisi, ogama lingu Nikodeme, umphathi wama Yuda, Lowo weza ku Yesu ebusuku, wathi kuye Rabi, siyazi ukuba ungumfundisi ovela ku Thixo; kuba akukho namnye umntu onako ukuyenza lemiqondiso uyenzayo wena, ukuba u Thixo akanaye. Waphendula u Yesu wathi kuye: Inene, inene ndithi kuwe, ukuba akathanga umntu azalwe ngokutsha akanakububona ubukumkani buka Thixo. Uthe u Nikodeme kuye: Angathinina umntu ukuzalwa emdala angaba nako yinina ukungena okwesibini esizalweni sonina azalwe? Waphendula u Yesu wathi: Inene, inene ndithi kuwe, ukuba umntu akathanga azalwe ngamanzi nangu Moya akanakungena ebukumkanini buka Thixo, okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama, nokuzelwe ngu Moya kungumoya, Mus'ukumangaliswa kukuba ndithi kuwe Nimelwe kukuthi nizalwe ngokutsha. Umoya uvuthela ungawazi apho uvela kona, nalapho usinga khona; bakwanjalo bonke abazelwe ngu Moya.
Bathandwa, nina, enize apha, ninqwenela u-baptizesho olungcwele, nivile ukunithandazela kwalen-

tlanganiso ukuba i-Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu ivume ukunamkela nokunithamsanqela, inikhulule ezonweni zenu ininike ubukumkani beZulu nobomi obungunaphakade njengokuba ne Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu ithembise ezwini layo elingcwele ngokuthi yena kwelodinga ngecala lakhe anyaniseke ukuligcina, nokulifeza.

Ngako oko ekubeni elidinga elenzile u Krestu, nani niyakuthi ngelenu icala nithembise ebusweni balentlanganiso yonke ukuba niyakumlahla u sathana, nayo yonke imisebenzi yakhe nizingise ukukholwa lilizwi lika Thixo elingcwele, nigcina nemiyalelo yakhe.
Uyamlahla na u-sathana nayo yonke imisebenzi yakhe kwane nkazimlo ezingendawo zomhlaba, nobungcwalisa bawo kunye nazo zonke inkanuko zawo neminqweno nokukhukuliswa yiyo.

Uyakholwa na ku Thixo u-Yise onamandla onke, u-Mdali wezulu no-mhlaba Naku Yesu Krestu okuphela ko Nyana wakhe ozelweyo oyi-Nkosi yethu. Ukuba wamitwa ngo Moya Oyingcwele wazalwa yi Ntombi u Mariya. Weva ubunzima

phantsi ko Pontyusi Pilato. Wabethelwa emnqamlezweni wafa, wancwatywa, Wehlela ehadisi, wavuka ngomhla wesithathu ekufeni; Wenyuka waya ezulwini: Apho ahleli kona ngasekunene ko-Thixo u Yise onamandla onke wobuya eze evela khona ekupheleni kwelizwe eza kugweba abahleliyo nabafileyo. Kanjalo uyakolwa na ku Moya Oyingcwele; Nayi Remente engcwele ekulo lonke ilizwe; Nabubudlelane babangcwele; Nakukuxolelwa kwezono; Nakukuvuka komzimba ekufeni; Nabubomi obungunaphakade emveni kokufa? Oku konke uyakholwa na kuko?
Njengokuba ukholwa njalo nje ke, unga ungabaptizeshwa na?
Woqinisa na ke ukuyiva intando, ka Thixo engcwele, nemithetho yakhe uhambe ngayo yonke imihla yokudla kwako ubomi?
IMPENDULO: Ndiyakulinga ukwenjenjalo. u Thixo engumncedi wam.
Thixo onetaru yenza ukuba ubuntu obudala bungcwatywe kwaba bantu kuvele ubuntu obutsha kubo. Amen.
Yenza ukuba zonke izimvo zenyama zife kubo, kuphile kukhule, konke oko Moya Oyingcwele kubo. Amen.
Mnike amandla okumeyisa ngomgcobo u Satana nomhlaba nenyama. Amen.

Makathi osukuba simnikela kuwe ngobufundisi bethu nangobukhonzi bethu amkele amalungelo asezulwini, nomvuzo ongunaphakade, ngalo ufefe lwakho, Nkosi, Thixo Mhlekazi ohleliyo, ozilawulayo into zonke ngobukhosi, kude kube ngunaphakade. AMEN.

Thixo Somandla, Ongunaphakade, o-Nyana wako oyintanda u Yesu Krestu wakhupha ecaleni lakhe elixabiso likhulu amanzi negazi, ukuze kuxolelwe izono zethu; waza wanika zonke intlanga, bazibaphatizeshe e Gameni lo Yise, lo-Nyana, lo Moya Oyingcwele; Ziphulaphule, siyakuthandaza, izikhungo zalentlanganiso. Wangcwalise lamanzi abe ngumqondiso wemfihlakalo yokuhlanjululwa kwezono wenze ukuba ababantu (Umntu oza) babaptizeshwa kuwo balufumane (a lufumane)
ufefe lwakho ngokupheleleyo, bahlale behleli bengabe nani (ahlale ehleli engowenani) labantwana bako abanyuliweyo, ngaye u-Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu Amen.

APHA UMFUNDISI WOMBAMBA ELOWO OZAKUBAPTIZESHWA NGE SANDLA SOKUNENE? AMSE NGASE FONTINI, ABUZE IGAMA LAKHE, AZE AMTSHIZE OKANYE AMGALELE, OKANYE AMNTYWILISELE EMANZINI NOGKUFUNA KWABO BABAPTIZESHWAYO ESITHI:‚Äî
Bani, ndiyakubaptizesha e-Gameni lo Yise, nelo Nyana nelo Moya Oyingcwele. Amen.
Umfundisi kunye nabo bonke abantu beguqile uyakwenza lomthandazo:

Bawo wethu osezulwini. Maliphathwe ngokungcwele igama lakho. Ubukumkani bakho mabufike. Intando yakho mayenziwe emhlabeni, njengokuba isenziwa ezulwini. Mawusiphe namhlanje isonka sethu semihla ngemihla. Usixolele izono zethu. Njengokuba nathi sixolela abo basonayo thina. Ugasingenisi ekuhendweni. Sisindise enkohlakalweni. Ngokuba ubukumkani buobakho
bakho namandla engawakho, nobungcwalisa bubobakho, kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.

Bayakuthi abo bantu banezizathu zokungabinako ukuguqa ngenxa yokwenzakala kwabo bawamkeliswe behleli phantsi okanye bemi umthendeleko. Kodwa makanganikwa umntu ongelilo lungu lethu ngaphandle kwaxa kuko umfundisi obonisa ukuba anganikwa ngezizathu ezihle. Kwakhona akuko mntu makamkeliswe isidlo ukuba unetyala angakhutshwayo ngalo e Tyalikeni.
Kwangoku njalo ukukhanya kwenu makukhanye phambi kwabantu, ukuze bayibone imisebenzi yenu elungileyo badumise uYihlo wenu osemanzulwini. Mateyo V. 16.

Ningaziqwebeli indyebo emhlabeni, apho kudla inundu, nomhlwa, nalapho amasela agqoboza khona, ebe; kodwa ziqwebeleni indyebo ezulwini, apho kungadli nomhlwa, nalapho amasela angagqobozi ebe khona. Mateyu VI. 19. 20.
Ize nithi ke ngoko, zonke izinto enithanda ukuba abantu bazenze kuni nenjenjalo nakubo, ngokuba oko kungu mthetho nabaprofite. Mat. VII. 12.
Asingabo bonke abathi kum, Nkosi! Nkosi! abayakungena ebukumkanini beZulu, ngabayenzayo, intando ka Bawo osezulwini kuphela. Mat. VII. 21.
Wema ke u-Zakeyu, wathi kwi-Nkosi: Bona ke, isiqingata sempahla yam Nkosi! ndisipha amahlwempu, nokuba kuko ondimhluthileyo into ngokulumkisa, ndiyakuyekeza ngento ephindiweyo kane. Luke XIX 8.

Ohlwayela ngokuncinane, wo vuna nangokuncinane, nohlwayela ngokuninzi wovuna, nangokuninzi. Mabanike bonke ngabanye njengokubekisa kwentliziyo yabo, kungabi ngokuvimba, nango kunyanzelwa, ngokuba u Thixo ethanda onikayo ngoku chwayita. 2, Kor. IX 6-7.
Njengokuba sinalo ithuba masisebenze sonke oko kulungileyo, makube ngabo kakhulu abanga bendlu yokholo. Gal. VI. 10.
Ubugqoboka obunako ukutomalala buyinzuzo enkulu. Ngokuba singezanga nanto ukuza emhlabeni, kuse khuleni ukuba asingephumi nanto kanjalo. I. Thi. VI 6-7.
Yaleza kwabo bazizityebi kwelilizwe ukuba bangabi naratshi, bangathembeli kubutyebi obunga-

qinisekanga, kodwa ku Thixo ophilileyo osinikayo zonke izinto ezintle. Mabenze ukulunga, batyebe ngokuvuma ukwabelana nabanye, baziqwebele isiseko esilungileyo sibe sesexesha eliza kuza, ukuze babambe ubomi obungunaphakade. I. Tim. 17-19.
U Thixo akanguye ongenakulunga, ukuba alibale umsebenzi wenu nesixelengo sothando, enilubonakalisileyo ngasegameni lakhe, nise nikhonzile nje abangcwele, nisa bakhonza kanjako. H. VI 10.
Kodwa ukwenza okulungileyo nokwabela zeningakulibali, ngokuba amadini anjalo ewakholela u Thixo. Heb. XIII. 16
Osukuba enabo ubutyebi, aze abone umzalwana wakhe eswele, athi ke noko amvalele umbilini wakhe, luthinina uthando luka Thixo ukuhlala kuye? I, Yohane III 17.
Owenzayo ngobubele kolihlwempu, uyamboleka u Yehova, nokwenza kwakhe wokubuyekezela kuye. Imizekeliso XIX 17.

Ngexesha ekusafundwa eziziqendwana umntu onyulelwelomsebenzi, uyakwamkela iminikelo yabantu, ngesitya esifanelekileyo, esifunelwe lomsebenzi aze ke akugqiba asinike u Mfundisi, oyakuthi yena asibeke kakuhle e tafileni.

nangentliziyo, enithandanayo nabamelwane benu, nizamela ukuhlala ngesimilo esitsha, nilandela imithetho ka Thixo, nihamba endleleni yakhe engcwele, sondelani ngokholo, niwutabate lomthendeleko ongcwele, ukuze nithuthuzeleke, nenze imvumo yenu elulamileyo ku Thixo onamandla onke niguqe ngamadolo,
Makenze umfundisi lemvumo ye zono, kunye nabo bonke abafuna ukwamkela lomthendeleko ongcwele, beguqile ngamadolo, besiti;

Thixo onamandla onke! Yise we Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu; Menzi wezinto zonke, no-Mgwebi wabo bonke abantu: Siyaguquka ngokwenene sinosizi lwentliziyo ngazo ezigqito zethu. Kubuhlungu sakuzikhumbula, ubunzima bazo asinakubuthwala. Siphathe ngetaru, Bawo obubele bungenambaliso. Sixolele konke okudluleyo ngenxa yo Nyana wakho i-Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu; wenze okokuba simane ukukukhonza, sikukholise ngentlalo entsha, kaloku nje nangamaxesha onke, ukuze kundunyiswe, kungcwaliswe, igama lakho, ngaye u Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu. Amen.
Thixo onamandla onke, Bawo wethu wasezul-

wini othe ngofefe lwakho olukhulu wababeka ngedinga lokuxolelwa izono zabo, bonke abaguqukayo kuwe ngogqoboko lwentliziyo, nangokholo lwenyaniso: Yiba netaru kuthi usixolele zonke izono zethu, usisindise kuzo. Siqinise usomeleze kuko konke okulungileyo, ude usingenise ebomini obungunaphakade: ngaye u-Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu. Amen.

Thixo Somandla, ezithe zonke intliziyo zatyileka kuye, yazeka yonke iminqweno yethu kuye, ekungeko zimfihlakalo zisitheleyo kuye, hlambulula inkumbulo zentliziyo zethu ngokuphefumla ko Moya wakho Oyingcwele, ukuze sikukhonze ngokufanelekileyo, silibonge igama lakho elingcwele, ngaye u-Yesu Krestu -iNkosi yethu. Amen.
Masibulele i Nkosi, u Thixo wethu.
Asikuko nokuba kufanelekile, kungumsebenzi osilungeleyo, ukuza kuwe ngamaxesha onke, kuzo zonke indawo, zizokubulela Yehova, Thixo onamandla onke ongunaphakade.
Ngoko kwakunye nengelosi, nawo wonke umhlambi wase zulwini, siyalibonga igama lako elin-
gcwele siyalizukisa, simana ukukudumisa sisithi: Uyingcwele, Uyingcwele, Uyingcwele, Yehova Thixo wemikhosi. Ubungcwalisa bakho buzalise izulu nomhlaba. Mawudunyiswe, Nkosi, ephezu konke. Amen.
MAKAGUQE UMFUNDISI NGASETAFILENI? ABATHANDAZELE BONKE ABAZAKWAMKELE UMTHENDELEKO NGALOMTHANDAZO ULANDELAYO BEGUQILE BONKE:

Asizi kule tafile yakho, Nkosi enofefe! sithemba ubulungisa betu, siza ngokuthemba izibele zakho ezikhulu nezininzi. Asifanelekile thina nokuba singachola imvuthuluka ngaphantsi kwetafile yakho Kodwa wena uyi Nkosi ehlala inetaru ngamaxesha onke. Siphe Nkosi enofefe, ukuba siyitye inyama yo-Nyana wakho u Yesu Krestu, silisele igazi lakhe, ngohlobo lokuze imizimba yethu yoboni ihlanjululwe ngomzimba wakhe, ithi nemiphefumlo yethu ngegazi lakhe elinqabileyo, sihlale sihleli kuye, naye ahlale kuthi kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
Umfundisi uyakuwuqhuba ngoluhlobo lulandelayo umthandazo wokungcwalisa:‚Äî

Thixo Somandla, Bawo wasezulwini, owathi ngetaru lakho elikhulu wamnikela u Nyana wakho emnye u Yesu Krestu ukuba eve ukufa emnqamlezweni ngenxa yokusindiswa kwetu, wathi ezinikele kona kwakanye wenza idini eli zalisekileyo, nentlawulelo eyaneleyo, ngenxa yezono zabantu bonke, wathi e Vangelini yakhe wasimisela isikhumbuzo sokufa kwakhe esiyakuhlala sisenziwa, ade abuye eze: Siphulaphule, siyakukunga silulamile, Bawo Onetaru, usiphe ukuba sithi sizamkela nje ezizidalwa zakho, isonka ne wayine, njengoko kwamiswayo ngu Nyana wakho u Yesu Krestu U Msindisi wethu sikukhumbula ukufa nokubandezelwa kwakhe, sibe nokwamkela um-Zimba wakhe ne-Gazi lakhe; owathi kwangobobusuku wanikelwa ngabo, (1) wathabatha i Sonka, akuba ebulele, (2) wasiqhekeza, wasinikela kubafundi bakhe, esithi Thabathani nidle, Ngum-Zimba wam lo onikelwa nina; Oku kwenzeleni ukukhunjulwa kwam. Kwathi kwangokunjalo emva kwesidlo sangokuhlwa, (1) wathabatha, i-Ndebe, wathi akuba ebulele, wayinikela kubo esithi, Selani nonke kuyo ngokuba(2) li-Gazi lam elingu-Mnqopiso omtsha, elaphalalela nina nabaninzi ukuze kuxolelwe izono: Ngamaxesha onke enisukuba niyisela oku kwenzeleni ukukunjulwa kwam. Amen.

1. WOTHI APHA UMFUNDISI ASITHABATHE ISITYA EZANDLENI ZAKHE:
2. ATHI APHA ASIBEKE AQHEKEZE ISONKA.
3. ATHI APHA ASIBEKE ISANDLA PHEZU KWASO SONKE ISONKA.

1. WOTHI APA AYITHABATHE INDEBE ESANDLENI.
2. APHA ASIBEKE ISANDLA PHEZU KWE ZITYA ZONKE EZINE WAYINE.

Andule amkele umfundisi ngokwake umthendeleko ngentlobo zombini athi emva koko aphe abanye abafundisi abakhoyo, andule ukunika abantu ngabanye ezandleni zabo beguqile ngentobeko. Wothi ke akunikela i-Sonka emntwini athethe lamazwi athi:

Umzimba we Nkosi yethu u Krestu owanikelwa wena, mawugcine umzimba no mphefumlo wakho ngonaphakade. Thabatha udle oku, ukhumbule ukuba u Krestu wafela wena, udle yena entliziyweni yakho ngokholo nango mbulelo.
WOTHI UMFUNDISI AKUNIKELA I NDEBE EMNTWINI ATHETHE LAMAZWI ATHI:
Igazi le Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu elaphalazelwa wena maligcine umzimba nomphefumlo wakho
ngonaphakade. Sela oku, ukukhumbula ukuba i-Gazi lika Krestu laphalalela wena ubulele.
(UKUBA SITHE SAPELA I-SONKA NE WAYINE ENGCWALISIWEYO BENGEKAMKELI BONKE, UMFUNDISI UYAKUPINDA UMTHANDAZO WOKUNGCWALISA ANGCWALISE NGOKUNYE NGOKWAMAZWI AMISIWEYO.)
Kothi konke okuseleyo umfundisi akubuyisele e Tafileni ekugqume ngelaphu elimhlophe. Emva koko umfundisi uyakwenza umthandazo we Nkosi:

Bawo wethu osezulwini! Maliphathwe ngobungcwele igama lakho. Ubukumkani bako mabufike. Intando yakho mayenziwe emhlabeni; Njengokuba isenziwa ezulwini. Mawusiphe namhla isonka sethu semihla ngemihla. Usixolele izono zethu: Njengokuba nathi sixolela abo basonayo thina. Ungasingenisi ekuhendweni, Sisindise enkohlakalweni; Ngokuba ubukumkani bubobako, Namandla engawakho, Nobungcwalisa bubobako, kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
Nkosi Bawo wasezulwini, thina bantu bakho

abazithobileyo siyakuthandaza ngokupheleleyo ukuba mawuthi ngobubele bobuzali bakho ulamkele elidini lethu lendumiso nombulelo; sikukhunga ngolulamo okokuba usiphe ukuba thina ne Tyalike yakho yonke sizuze uxolelo lwezono zethu, nawo onke amanye amalungelo entlungu zakhe, ngemfaneleko nokufa ko Nyana wakho u Yesu Krestu nangokholo egazini lakhe.

Nakaloku Nkosi, sizinikela kuwe imizimba nemiphefumlo yethu, ukuba sibe lidini eliqondakalayo, elingcwele elipheleleyo; sikukhunga ngolulamo ukuba sithi sonke thina madlelane ngalo-Mthendeleko ongcwele sizaliswe lufefe nentsikelelo yakho yase zulwini. Nangona singafanele ngenxa yezono zethu ezininzi, ukukwenzela idini, kodwa sikukhunga ukuba uyamkele lenkonzo yethu, esimelwe kukuyenza; ungalinganiseli ukufaneleka kwethu, kodwa usixolele iziposo zethu, ngenxa ka Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu; esithi ngaye sidumise wena Bawo, uno-Nyana wakho lowo, nibanye no-Moya Oyingcwele, ngonaphakade. Amen.
Udumo ku Thixo ophezulu, uxolo emhlabeni, inkolelo ebantwini, Siyakubonga, siyakuncoma,

siyakunqula, siyakudumisa, siyakubulela ngenxa yobukhulu bodumo lwakho, Nkosi, Thixo, Kumkani wasezulwini, Thixo Bawo Somandla. Wena Nkosi, Nyana okuphela kozelweyo, Yesu Krestu; Nkosi Thixo Mvana ka Thixo, Nyana ka Yise, wena osusa izono zelizwe, Taru! Wena osusa izono zelizwe, wamkele umthandazo wethu. Wena ohleli ngasekunene kuka Thixo u Yise, Taru. Ngokuba nguwe wedwa ongcwele; nguwe wedwa oyi Nkosi; nguwe wedwa Krestu, no-Moya Oyingcwele, ongaphezu konke ebuqaqawulini buka Thixo u Yise. Amen.
UKUBA UMFUNDISI UYABONA ANGENZA UMTHANDAZO WENTLOKO! ANDULE UKWENZA UFEFE:

Uxolo luka Thixo olugqita kuko konke ukuqonda, malugcine intliziyo nengqondo zenu, nimazi nimthande u Thixo, no Nyana wakhe u Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu: athi u Thixo, no Nyana wakhe u Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu: athi u-Somandla, u-Yise, u-Nyana, u-Moya Oyingcwele, anisikelele ahlale kuni ngonaphakade. Amen.
QONDANI: UKUBA UMFUNDISI AKANAXESHA LANELEYO ANGASHIYA NAYIPINA
Kothi ngemini emisweyo, bonke abazakwamkelwa baziswe ngapambili, ukuze umfundisi enze okukuthetha kulandelayo ekubhekisa entlanganisweni:‚Äî

Bazalwana abathandiweyo kunene izi Bhalo ezingwele zisifundise ukuba i-Tyalike igumzi ka Thixo umhlambi ontloko ingu Yesu; Ubudlelane base Tyalikeni kukonwabisana kwa malungu ayo, omnye nomnye.............

Yaye ke injongo zobubudlelane kukugcinwa kwemfundiso ezintle, kwakunye nezimiselo zonqulo lobu Krestu, nokusetyenziswa kwalomandla aye a vele ku Thixo, no -Mthetho athe u Yesu wawunikela eTyalikeni yakhe yokwandiswa kobungcwalisa. Yimfanelo yabantu bonke ngoko, ukuba bamanyane kobubudlelane ngenxa yokuba ngabo bodwa abathe batyaleka endlwini ka Yehova abayakutyatyamba emakhusini o Thixo wethu. Ezona Mfanelo zinamandla kobubudlelane:

kukwakhiwa koxolo, nomanyano, kuthwalisana imithwalo, nokunqandana ekuweni omnye nomye, ukuzama intlanganiso ebuhlobo buzeleyo komnye, nomnye,ukuzingisa elukholweni nase nkonzweni ye gospile, ukuthandazelana nokuvelana omnye nomnye. Phakathi kwamalungelo obubudlelane kukuqubelana ebungcwaliseni ngelizwi lika Thixo, nange sabelo kwizi miselo zika Krestu, ngokubekwa phantsi kweliso labafundisi, nokuzinikela ekonwatyisweni zintsikelelo ezithenjiswe kwabo bendlu yokholo. Kubo obubudlelane bunje ukuba ngcwele, aba bantu bemi phambi kwenu beze kufuna ukwamkelelwa kubo,ekubeni sebelufumene uphehlelelo olungcwele, baza babufeza ubulingwa babo benyanga ezintandathu phantsi kweliso labakhokeli abazeleyo.
Ngako oko siza kuthi eloyikweni luka Thixo sibabuze ngokholo lwabo nange njongo zabo ukuze nazi ukuba bangabantu abafanelekileyo ukuba bangamkelwa e Tyalikeni.
Wothi umfundisi ukuteta ebhekisa kwabo bamkelwayo:‚Äî

Bathandwa, nize apha ngokufuna ukunga ningazimanya ne Bandla awalithengayo ngegazi lakhe u-Msindisi wetu. Sivuya elufefeni luka Thixo athe waninika lona, ekunibizeni kwakhe ukuba nibe ngabalandeli bakhe. Sivuyiswa nakukuba ukuza kufikela kwelixesha inqubo yenu ibe ntle. Niwavile amathamsanqa, nentsikelelo namalungelo obulungu e Tyalikeni ka Krestu. Ke ngaphambi kokuba namkelwe ngo kuzeleyo kuyi mfanelo ukuba nihlaziye izifungo zenu ekuhleni ngokuxela ukholo lwenu, nangokuvakalisa injongo zenu ngokuphendula lemibuzo ilandelayo:

Phambi ko-Thixo nasebusweni balentlanganiso nihlaziya ngokungcwele isithembiso, esikucebano lo Baptizesho, niyanyaniiseka na ukukuqinisekisa oko, niyavuma na ukuzibopha ngokuthembekileyo, ukuluqonda nokulugcina olocebano, nazo zonke izinto ezikulo?
Ninalo na ukholo olusindisayo ku Yesu Krestu?
Ninoluvo oluhle na ngakuwo onke amalungu eli Bandla
Niyakholelwa na ezimfundisweni zezi Bhalo ezingcwele njengoko zibekiweyo kwisivumo sengqoboko ye African Methodist Episcopal Church?
Nolawulwa na yi Discipline ye A. M. E. Church niyenze ngcwele imimiso ka Thixo, nizama ngako konke ukuphakamisa intlalo entle yobuzalwane, nokuhanjiselwa phambili kobu kumkani buka Krestu?
Niyakurola na kwimpahla yenu yase mhlabeni, ngamandla enu, ukuxhasa ivangeli, amahlwempu i-Tyalike, nezinye imbutho zobu-Krestu?
Ndiya kwenjenjalo, u Thixo engumncedi wam.
Mazithi izikungo zethu zifike phambi kobuso baKho.
Apha wobhekisa e Bandleni umfundisi ngokuthi:
Bazalwana nizivile impendulo ezenziweyo emibuzweni yethu. Ukhona ke kuni onesizathu angasixelayo sokuba ababantu abafanelekile ukuba bangamkelwa ebulungwini obuzeleyo eBandleni?

Thixo, Bawo wasemazulwini, osebenzayo kuthi ukuba sivume senze ezo zinto zamkelekileyo pambi Kwakho: Senza ezi zikhungo kuwe ngenxa yezi zicaka zakho ezamkelela ebudlelaneni babantu bakho. Ngamana isandla sakho sobuzali singaba phezu kwazo: ngamana uMoya oyiNgcwele angasoloko enazo; zanga zingakhula elubabalweni nase kuyazini iNkosi yethu nomSindisi uYesu Kristu, zilandela imihla ngemihla umzekelo wakhe osulungekileyo. Vuma nKosi ukubonisa, ukungcwalisa, nokukhokela thina endleleni yemiyalelo yakho, nakuwo umzamo wokuzuza imiphefumlo, nokwakhela iBandla lakho ebungcweleni; ize sithi ngenkuselo yakho enamandla silondolozwe imizimba nemiphefumlo side sizivulelwe ingcango zobukumkani obungapheliyo beNnkosi yethu nomSindisi uYesu Kristu. Amen.
Xa kungeko sizathu umfundisi uyakwenjenje kubo:

Siyanamkela ngovuyo kubo ubudlelane be Bandla lika Thixo, nakubo ubungqina ubuhle bobu Krestu. Ngentliziyo yam yonke ndinamkela ngokunolulela isandla sam sokunene, sobudlelane. Wanga u Thixo anganinika ukuba nibe ngamalungu athembekileyo e Bandla elise dabini nide nibizelwe ebulungwini be Bandla eseloyisile, elingenasiphako emehlweni ka Thixo.
Ngalomini ngexesha elimisweyo abatshati baya kungena e Caweni baye kuma ngapambili, indoda ngasekunene, inkazana ngasekhohlo andule umfundisi ukuthi.

Bathandwa sihlangene apha phambi ko Thixo, nale ntlanganiso, ukuze simanye lendoda nalenkazana ngom-Tshato ongcwele, oyintlalo ebekekileyo, eyadalwa ngu Thixo oko bekungekabikho sono, ezekelisa ukumanywa kuka Krestu ne Tyalike yakhe; awathi u Krestu ngokwakhe, wayizukisa ngokubakho kwakhe, nango mqondiso wakhe wokuqala, awawenzayo e Kana yase Galili; inconywa nokunconywa ngu Paulos ongcwele, othe yinto enokubekwa ngabantu bonke, ke ngoko ayinakufumana

ingenwe ngokungaqondi, nangokufeketha, nangobutshijolo, ngenxa yokukolisa inkanuko zenyama ngokwezilo ezingenangqondo, mayingenwe ngabantu ngentlonelo, nentelekelelo ngengqiqo, ngobuncathu, nangokumoyika u Thixo.
Aba bantu babini ke bazokumanywa kulentlalo engcwele, ukuba ke kuko ongapahakamisa isizathu sokuba abafanelwe kumanywa, makasixele ngoku; athi ukuba akenjenjalo ahlale athi cwaka ngonaphakade.
UMFUNDISE ABHEKISE KWABO BANTU BATSHATAYO ATHI:

Ndiyaniyala nobabini, njengokuba niyakuphendula ngomhla owoyikekayo womgwebo, xeshikweni imfihlelo zentliziyo zonke ziyakutyilwa, ukuba kukho kuni nobabini osaziyo isizathu sokuba anifanele kumanywa ngomtshato, makasixele kaloku nje. Ngokuba yazini lento, okokuba bonke abatshata ngapandle kokuvunyelwe li-Zwi lika Thixo, abamanywe ngu Thixo, nokutshata kwabo akulungelelene nomthetho.
Ukuba akuko uxele sizathu sokuba mabangatshati, umfundisi uyakuhambisa athi endodeni:

Bani, Uyayithabatha na le Ntombi ukuba ibe ngumfazi wakho, ukuze nihlale nobabini ngokomthetho ka Thixo entlaweni engcwele yom-Tshato? Uyakuyithanda na, uyonwabise, uyibeke, uyigcine, ekuphileni nase kuguleni uthi uwayeka onke amanye, uhlale nayo yodwa lonke ixesha eniyakudla ngalo-ubomi nobabini?

Bani, uyayithabatha na lendoda ukuba ibe yindoda yakho, ukuze nihlale nobabini ngomthetho ka Thixo entlalweni engcwele yom-Tshato? Uyakuyiphulaphula na, uyikhonze, uyithande, uyibeke, uyigcine ekupileni nase kuguleni, uthi uwayeka onke amanye, uhlale nayo yodwa lonke ixesha eniyakudlan galo ubomi nobabini?
Bothi banikelane inyaniso ngoluhlobo, umfundisi athi:
abambise isandla sokunene se-Nkazana ngesokunene sendoda, zeyona ithethe emva kwake ithi:

Mna Bani, ndiyakuthabatha wena Bani, ukuba ube ngumfazi wam endimtshatileyo, ukuba ndibe nawe ndikugcine namhla nangexesha elizayo, nangexesha lokwanela nangexesha lokuswela, nxa ungapahilanga, nanxa uphilileyo, ndikuthande ndikondle ngomtheto ongcwele ka Thixo, side sahlulwe kukufa; ngoko ke ndikunikela inyaniso yam.
Bayekane ke izandla, ithi i-Nkazana ngesandla sayo sokunene ibambe esokunene se-Ndoda, ithethe nayo emva ko-Mfundisi, ithi:

Mna Bani, ndithabatha wena Bani, ukuba ube yindoda yam endiyitshatileyo ukuba ndibe nawe, ndikugcine namhla, ebumnandini nase bubini; ebutyebini nase kusweleni; nditkuthande, ndikondle, ndikuphulaphule, ngoko Mthetho ongcwele ka Thixo, side sahlulwe kukufa, ngoko ke ndikunikela inyaniso yam.
Thixo Ongunaphakade, Mdali no Mlondolozi wabo bonke abantu, Mniki walo lonke ufefe

lomoya, Mbangi yobomi baphakade; Yitho be intsikelelo yakho phezu kwababantu, lendoda nalenkazana, sibasikelelayo e-Gameni lakho; ukuze kuthi, njengokuba u-Isake no Rebeka bahlala bethandana begcinene, bathi kanjalo nababantu, basiqinise ukusenza nokusigcina isifungo nesibambiso abanikelene ngaso, bahlale bobabini ngothando, nangoxolo, oluzalisekileyo, bahambe ngendlela yemithetho yakho ngaye u Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu. Amene.

Ukuba abatshati bayafuna, indoda iyakunikela umsesane ku Mfundisi, oyakuthi yena awubuyisele kuyo eyiyalele ukuba mayiwufake kowesine umnwe we Nkazana kwingalo yase khohlo. Indoda iyakubhekisa e Nkazaneni ilandela emva ko Mfundisi isithi:
Ngawo lo msesane, osisiboniso nesibambiso sawo umnqophiso owenziweyo kaloku phakathi kwam nawe, ndiya kuthabatha, ube ngumfazi wam egameni loYise, neloNyana neloMoya oyi-Ngcwele.
Aze umfundisi ahlanganise izandla zabo zokunene athi:
Abo bamanywe ngu Thixo mabangahlukaniswa mntu.

Njengokuba u Bani no Bani bevumelene ngo-Mtshato ongcwele bekunqinela oko phambi ko Thixo nalentlanganiso, banikelana inyaniso yabo, ngokunikelane, nokwamkela umsesane na ngokubambana ngezandla; Ndiyashumayela ukuba bayi Ndoda, No-Mfazi, e-Gameni lo Yise, Lo-Nyana, lo-Moya Oyingcwele. Amen.

U Thixo u Yise, u Thixo u-Nyana, u Thixo u-Moya Oyingcwele, makanisikelele, anilondoloze anigcine; I-Nkosi mayiniphathe ngenceba, inikhangela ngobubele; inikholise ngawo onke amathamsanqa omoya, nangofefe lwayo, ize intlalo, yenu nobabini ilunge kobubomi bukoyo, ukuze ningene ebomini baphakade. Amen.
Bawo wethu osezulwini; Maliphathwe ngobungcwele igama lakho. Ubukumkani bakho mabufike. Intando yakho mayenziwe emhlabeni; Njengokuba isenziwa ezulwini. Mawusiphe namhla

nje isonka sethu semihla ngemihla. Usixolele izono zethu; Njengokuba nathi sibaxolela abo basonayo thina. Ungasingenisi ekuhendweni; Sisindise enkohlakalweni; Ngokuba ubukumkani bubobakho, Namandla engawakho, Nobungcwalisa bubobakho. Kude kube ngunaphakade. Amene.

Thixo ka Abraham, Thixo ka Isake, Thixo ka Yakobi basikelele ababantu bakho, uyihlwayele ezintliziyweni zabo imbewu yobomi obungunaphakade; ukuze bathi bonke abakufundayo e-Lizwini lakho elingcwele bakwenze ngo kukhutheleyo Bakhangele ngetaru Nkosi usezulwini, ubasikelele. Uthi njengokuba wabathobelayo u Abraham no Sara intsikelelo uzisikelele izicaka zakho, zize zithi ziyenza intando yakho zikhuselwa nguwe, zihlale eluthandweni lwakho bude buphele ubomi bazo, ngaye u Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu. Amen.

Thixo owathi ngamandla akho amakhulu wazidala zonke izinto ngelize owathi (zakuba zilungisiwe ezinye izinto) wamisa okokuba umfazi azuze ukuvela kwakhe endodeni (eyadalwa ngemfano yakho); wathi ubamanyile wafundisa okokuba akusoze kuvunyelwe ukuba bahlulwe obenze babanye ngom-Tshato: Thixo, owayingcwalisayo

intlalo yom-Tshato ukuba ibe ngu mqondiso olunge kangakana, ukude uthi ngawo ulinganisele ukutshata kwase zulwini, nokumanywa kuka Krestu ne Tyalike yakhe; Bakhangela ngetaru ababantu bazizicaka zakho; ize ithi lendoda imthande umfazi wayo ngokwe-Lizwi lakho (Njengokuba u Krestu eyithandile i Tyalika yakhe, wayincamela ubomi bakhe, eyithanda eyondla njengokungathi yinyama yakhe), ithi lenkazana iyithande indoda yayo iyilulamele iyikolise, iyiphulaphule, ithi ngolulamo, ngobuncathu, nangokuzola, ifuze abafazi abangcwele abalungileyo. Basikelele ke bobabini Nkosi, ubaphe ukuba babudle ilifa ubukumkani bakho, obungunaphakade ngaye u Yesu Krestu i-Nkosi yethu. Amen.

U-Thixo u-Somandla owathi ekuqalekeni wadala o Adam no-Eva, wabangcwalisa, wabamanya ngom-Tshato; Makanikhangele ngobutyebi bofefe lwakhe, aningcwalise, anisikelele, nize nimkolise ngemizimba nangemiphefumlo yenu, nihlale nobabini ngothandano olungcwele bude buphele ubomi bethu. Amen.
Kwanga kungabakho kuni nonke ufefe lwe Nkosi yethu uYesa Kristu nothando luka Thixo nobudlelanano Moya oyingcwele. Amen.
Umsebenzi wokungcwaba ungaqutywa ngoluhlobo lulandelayo, umhlawumbi nangayipina enye indlela efanelekileyo. Umfundisi uyakuti alikawulele idlaka, ahambe pambi kwalo esithi:
Mna ndikukuvuka, ndibubomi, okholwayo kum nakuba efile, wodla ubomi noko; nosukuba esidla ubomi, ekholwa kum, akasayi kuze afe. Yohane, XI, 25-26.

Ndiyazi ukuba u Mkhululi wam uhleli, nokuba wosuka ekupheleni eme phezu komhlaba. Naxeshikweni emva kwentlonze yam sekubujiswe umzimba lo, ndothi noko enyameni yam, ndimbone u Thixo: endiyakubona ngokwam, namehlo am ayakumkhangela engenguye wumbi. Job. XIX, 25-27.
Asizanga nanto ukuza emhlabeni: kusekuhleni ukuba asingephumi nanto kanjalo. Ngu Yehova obenika, ngu Yehova ohluthileyo. Igama lika Yehova malidunyiswe. 1 Timote, VI 7. Job, 1:21.
XA SEKUNGENWE E-CAWENI KUNGAFUNDWA LE NDUMISO:
Nkosi waba likhaya lethu izizukulwana ngezizukulwana.

Zingekadalwa intaba, ungekadali umhlaba nelizwe, kwangonaphakade kude kube ngunaphakade, wena ungu Thixo. Uyakumguqulela entshabalalweni umntu, uthi: Buyelani, bonyana babantu! Ngokuba ebusweni bakho iwaka leminyaka linjenge mini yezolo xa igqithileyo nanjengomlindo ebusuku. Uyabakhukhulisa, banjengobuthongo; kusasa banjenge nca ehlumayo. Ngokuba sigqitywa ngengqumbo yakho, siyakwanqiswa ngomsindo wakho. Inkohlakalo zethu uzibekile phambi kwakho. Izono zethu ezifihlakeleyo uzibekile ekukanyeni kobuso bakho. Ngokuba yonke imihla yethu siyigqiba njengembhali. Imihla yeminyaka yethu yiminyaka emashumi asixenxe; naxa ithi ngenxa yokomelela ibe yiminyaka emashumi asibozo; amandla ayo abubu nzima nobubi noko ngokuba inqanyulwa kamsinya, size silibale.

Ngubanina owazi amandla engqumbo yakho, nomsindo wakho ngangokoyikeka kwakho? Sazise ukubala imihla yethu ukuze sizuze intliziyo elumkileyo, Buya Yehova! Koba kade kangakanani na? Uze ube nosizi phezu kwezicaka zakho. Sikholise kusasa ngobubele bakho, ize sigcobe sivuye yonke imihla yethu, Sivuyise njengokwemihla wabusibandezela ngayo, Njengokweminyaka sabesibonga ububi ngayo. Makubonakale izenzo zakho, ezicakeni
zakho, nobungcwalisa bakho kubantwana bazo. Mabuthi ubuhle buka Yehova, u-Thixo wethu, bube phezu kwethu, nomsebenzi wezandla zethu uwuqinise phezu kwethu; ewe umsebenzi wezandla zethu uwuqinise.
Udumiso malubeko kuye u Yise, nakuye u-Nyana, nakuye u Moya Oyingcwele.
Njengokuba kube kunjalo kwasekuqalekeni, kunjalo nakaloku nje, kuyakumana kuba njalo kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.
MHLAWUMBI KUNGAFUNDWA KWEYOKUQALA KUMA KORINTE XV. 20-58.
Emva kwesifundo kungenziwa iculo, ekothi ke emva koko kushunyayelwe, okanye kuvalwe, umhlawumbi kuthandazwe ukuba kuyabonakala. Xa kufakwa idlaka engcwabeni, Umfundisi uyakuthi:
Umntu ozelwe ngumfazi imihla yobomi bakhe mifutshane, uyakholiswa yena lusizi, uyavela ke, andul'ukunqanyulwa njengembali; uyabaleka njengokungathi sisithunzi, angezi ahlale entlalweni nye.
Phakathi kokudliwa kobomi sikwasekufeni, sesiya kufuna usizo kubanina; kuphela sifune kuwe.
Kodwa, Nkosi! Thixo obungcwele bungaphezu kwembaliso, Nkosi, enamandla onke, Msindisi onetaru elikhulu! Zungasilahli ezintlungwini zokufa okungunaphakade.

Wena, Nkosi! Uyazazi imfihlakalo zentliziyo zethu; ungavingceli indlela zakho zofefe saku thandaza; zusinyamezele, Nkosi ebungcwele buphezu konke Thixo, ongu Somandla, Msindisi onetaru elikhulu, Mgwebi ofaneleyo kanye! uz'ungavumi ukuba sithi nanga ziphina intlungu zokufa siwe kuwe ekupeleni kokudla kwethu ubomi.
APA OMNYE UMNTU UYAKUTHABATHA UMHLABA AZE AMANE EWUPHOSA EDLAKENI. UMFUNDISI EFUNDA LAMAZWI:‚Äî

Njengokuba kukholekile ku Thixo onamandla onke ukuwubiza umnke apha umphefumlo walomzalwana (dade) omkileyo othandekileyo, siyawufaka umzimba wakhe emhlabeni; ungumhlaba emhlabeni, uluthuthu eluthuthwini, uluthuli eluthulini; sinethemba eliqinisekileyo lokuba abo bafele ku Krestu bobuya bavuke baye ebomini obungenakuphela, ngayo i-Nkosi yethu no Msindisi oyakuguqula lomzimba wethu wonakeleyo, ukuze wenziwe
ufane nomzimba wakhe onobungcwalisa, ngokusebenza kwakhe okunamandla ukuzoyisa zonke izinto zibe phantsi kwakhe.
Ndeva ilizwi livela ezulwini lisithi: Bala ukuthi; Banethamsanqa abafileyo, abafeleyo e Nkosini kwakaloku nje. Ewe. utsho u Moya ukuze baphumle kuyo imizamo yabo.

Bawo wethu osezulwini! Maliphathwe ngobungcwele igama lakho. Ubukumkani bakho mabufike. Intando yakho mayenziwe emhlabeni Njengokuba isenziwa ezulwini, Mawusiphe namhla isonka sethu semihla ngemihla. Usixolele izono zethu; Njengokuba nathi sixolela abo basonayo thina. Ungasingenisi ekuhendweni; Sisindise enkohlakalweni. Amen.

Thixo onofefe! Yise we Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu. Oluvuko nobubomi Athi okholwayo kuye aphile noko ngathi ufile, nohleli ekholwa nguye angabubi ngonaphakade. Siyazigoba, sikubongoza Bawo ukuba usivuse ekufeni sisono, sidle ubomi bobulungisa, ukuze ziphumle kuwe emva

kobubomi; ukuze sithi kanjalo ngomhla womgqibelo xa bavukayo bonke abantu, sifunyanwe sikholekile ebusweni bakho, Samkele elothamsanqa liyakunikwa ngu Nyana wakho kubo bonke abathandekayo, nabakoyikayo, esithi: Yizani nina nithanyusanqelisiweyo ngu Bawo, nibudle ilifa ubukumkani enibulungiselweyo kwasekusekweni komhlaba. Yenza oku Bawo onofefe! Siyakuthandaza ngaye u Yesu Krestu u Mthetheleli no Mkhululi wethu. Amene.
Ufefe lwe-Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu, nothando luka Thixo nobudlelane bo Moya Oyingcwele, malube nani nonke. Amene. 2. Kor. XIII, 14.

Alimisiwe na ixesha lomntu emhlabeni? Nemihla yakhe ayinjenge mihla yomqeshwa na? Njengoqashiweyo xa elinda umvuzo wakhe kunjalo ukwabelwa kwam inyanga zobubi, nokumiselwa kwabusuku obudinisayo. Imihla yam igqitha ngokukhawuleza isilukiso somluki, Iliso lalowo undibonileyo alisayikuba sandibona. Awakho amehlo obaphezu kwam ndize ndingabi sabikho. Njengokuphela, nokuthi shwaka kwelifu unjalo lowo uya engcwabeni akabuye abuye. Job. VII.
Ngokuba kukho ithemba phezu komthi lokuba

wothi, nxa ugawulwayo ubuye uhlume, noduba ihlumelo lawo aliyikuphela. Ukuba iba ndala emhlabeni ingcambu yawo, nokuba siyafa isiphunzi sawo emhlabeni uyakuthi noko ngalo ivumba lamanzi ubuye untshule, wenze amasebe njengesityalo esitsha. Kodwa yena umntu uyafa, aphele, ewe, uphume umphefumlo aze abe uphike?

Amanzi ayanqamka elwandle, nomsinga uyatsha, wona ke; kwangokunjalo umntu uyalala pantsi, angabi saphakama; kude kungabisabikho amazulu, abayi kuvuka, abayi kuvuswa ebuthongweni babo kanjalo. Ukuba uthi umntu afe wobuye aphile na? Yonke imihla yexesha lam elimisiweyo ndiyakulinda de kufike ukutshintshwa kwam. Uyakubiza ndisabele kuwe mna. Uyakuwufuna umsebenzi wezandla zakho. Job. XIV.

Nkosi waba likhaya lethu; izizukulwana ngezizukulwana. Kungekazalwa ntaba, ungekavelisi hlabathi nazwe limiweyo; kususela kwasephakadeni ungu-Thixo wena. Ubuyisela umntu eluthulini uthi Buyani, bonyana babantu. Ngokuba iwaka leminyaka emehlweni akho linjenge mini yezolo xa idluleyo; linjengomlindo wasebusuku Uyabakhukhulisa, banjengobuthongo; Ngengomso banjengengca ehlumayo. Kusasa iyatyatyamba,

ibuye ihlume: Ngokuhlwa iyasikwa, yome. Ngokuba siyaphela ngumsindo wakho: Sikwanqiswa bubushushu bakho. Ububeke ubugwenxa bethu phambi kwakho: Nezono zethu zangasese uzibeke ekukhanyiseleni kobuso bakho.

Ngokuba yonke imihla yethu isangene ngomsindo wakho: Siyiphelise iminyaka yethu njengencwina. Imihla yeminyaka yethu iseminyakeni engamashumi asixhenxe, ukuba sithe somelela ibe ngamashumi asibhozo: Lithi iqayiya layo libe kukwaphuka nenkathazo kuba iphela kamsinya, simke singabi sabikho.
Ngubanini owaziyo amandla omsebenzi wakho, buralarume bakho: ngoko ufanele ukoyikwa ngako?

Sazise kanye ukuyibala imihla yethu: ukuze sizuze intliziyo elumkileyo. Buya, Nkosi, koda kube ninina: usohlwaye ngenxa yabakonzi bakho. Sikholise kwakusasa ngenceba yakho: simemelele, sivuye yonke imihla yethu. Sivuyise ngokwemihla owasicinezela ngayo: Ngokweminyaka esabona ububi ngayo.
Mayibonakale kuba khonzi imisebenzi nobungangamsha bakho kubantwana babo.
Ububele Be-Nkosi U-Thixo wethu mabube phezu kwethu, zimasa, Thixo, izenzo zezandla
zethu phezu kwethu; izenzo zezandla zethu uzizimase zona.

Wosuka ubani athi, Bathi-nina ukuvuka abafileyo? Bezanamzimba unjanina? Sisweli-kuqonda, wena into, oyihlwayelayo ayenziwa iphile, ukuba ayikhanga ife: kanjalo lonto uyihlwayelayo akuhlwayeli sona isiqu sento esiyakubakho, uhlwayela ukhozo nje, lungathi lube lolwenqolowa, nokuba lolwezinye intlobo, u-Thixo ke ulunika isiqu njengoko athandileyo; iyi leyo imbewu uyinika eyaso isiqu. Yonke inyama ayinyama nye; enye yinyama ya bantu, enye yinyama ye Nkomo, enye yeyentlanzi, enye yeyentaka. Kukhoziziqu ezisezulwini, neziqu ezisemhlabeni; bubodwa ubuqaqawuli bezasezulwini, bubodwa obezasemhlabeni. Budodwa ubuqaqawuli belanga, bubodwa ubuqaqawuli benyanga, bubodwa ubuqaqawuli benkwenkwezi; kuba inkwekwezi iyahluka kwenye inkwenkwezi ngobuqaqawuli. Lunjalo ke kanye novuko lwabafileyo. Umzimba uhlwayelwa unokonakala, uvuka ungenakonakala. Uhlwayelwa uswele imbeko uvuka unobuqaqawuli; Uhlwayelwa uswele amandla, uvuka unamandla; Kuhlwayelwa umzimba ongowemvelo, kuvuka umzimba ongowomoya.

Kukho umzimba ongowemvelo. kukho umzimba ongowomoya. Ngokunjalo kubaliwe kwathiwa Owokuqala umntu u Adam, waba ngu moya odlisa ubomi. Ke akuqali oko moya, kuqala okwemvelo, kwandule ukuza okomoya. Owokuqala umntu uphume emhlabeni ngowomhlaba; owesibini umntu, i-Nkosi, uphume ezulwini. Into ayiyo owomhlaba, bakwayiyo abomhlaba; kanjalo nento ayiyo osezulwini bakwayiyo abasezulwini. Njengokuba sawambathayo umfanekiso wowomhlabu siyakuwambatha nomfanekiso wosezulwini.

Ke bazalwana, nditsho ukuthi inyama negazi azi nako ukubudla ilifa ubukumkani buka Thixo, nokonakala akunakubudla ilifa ukungonakali. Yabonani, ndinixelela imfihlo. Okunene asiyikulala ukufa sonke. Kodwa siyakwenziwa ngakumbi sonke, ngesiquphe, ngephanyazo, ngexilongo lokugqibela. Kuba liyakulila ixilongo, bavuswe abafileyo bengenakonakala senziwe ngakumbi ke thina. Kuba kumele oku konakalayo ukwambatha ukungonakali nokukufayo ukwambatha ukungafi. Xa ke oku konakalayo kuthe kwambatha ukungonakali noku kunokufa kuthe kwambatha ukungafi, liyakwandula ukwenzeka ilizwe elibhaliweyo lokuthi ukufa kufincelwe eloyisweni. Luphina, kufa ulwamvila lwakho! Luphina, hadesi, uloyiso

lwakho? Ulwamvila, lokufa sisono; amandla esono ngumthetho. Makubulelwe ke ku Thixo osinikayo uloyiso olo ngayo i-Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu. Ngoko ke bazalwana bam abazithandwa, qinani, ningabi nakushukuma, nihlale niphuthuma umsebenzi wenkosi, nisazi nje ukuba ukubulaleka kwenu akulambathi e-Nkosini.

Akuba ekulile umntwana ngamini ithile waphuma waya kuyise kubavuni. Waza wathi ku Yise: Intloko, Intloko. Uyise wayalela umfana ukuba amse kunina, apho afike walala phezu kwamadolo kanina kwada kwase mini, wand'ukubhubha Wenyuka unina waya kumlalisa phezu komandlalo wendoda ka Thixo, wamvalela waphuma ke. Waza wabiza indoda yakhe, wathi: ndithumele omnye wabafana nelinye iqwarashekazi ndibaleke ngalo ndiye endodeni ka Thixo ndize ndibuyelele.

Yathi indoda: kunganina ukuba namhla, inyanga ayikatwasi, asiyiyo ne Sabatha. Waza wathi umfazi: akunanto kuyakulunga, Waza walibopha iqwarashekazi elo wayalela umfana ukuba amqube, ahambele phambili, angamlibazisi. ukuba

akutsho yena. Wasuka ke wahamba weza kuyo indoda ka Thixo entabeni ye Karamele. Kwaye kuthe yakumbona indoda ka Thixo esekude yathi ku-Gehazi isicaka sayo: nankuya lom-Shunemekazi. Gitshima uyekumhlangabeza, uthi kuye: Kulungile na kuwe, nakwindoda yakho, nakumntwana wakho? Wathi: kulungile, Wathi akufika kwindoda ka Thixo entabeni wabamba inyawo zayo. Wasuka wasondela u Gehazi ukuba amthyale, Kodwa yathi indoda ka Thixo: myeke, ngokuba umphefumlo wakhe urara phakathi kwake: Kanti u Yehova undifihlele lento, akandixelelanga. Waza wathi: ndikhe ndacela na unyana enkosini yam. Bendingathi na ungandikhohlisa? Yandula yathi indoda ka Thixo ku Gehazi: Binqa isinqe sako uphate umsimelelo wam esandleni sakho uhambe; ukuba uhlangana nomntu ungabulisi: kanjalo ukuba umntu uyakubulisa wena ungasabeli kuye: uye wathi: uwubeke umsimelelo wam pezu kobuso bomntwana. Kodwa unina nomphefumlo wathi: Ehleli nje u Yehova. uhleli nje nomphefumlo wakho, andiyikukushiya. Yaselisuka imlandela. Waza u Gehazi wahamba phambi kwabo waya wabeka umsimelelo phezu kobuso bomntwana, kodwa akubanga kho zwi, nakuva. Ngako oko wabuya waya kumhlangabeza, esithi: Umntwana efile, elele phezu komandlalo wakhe.

Ngoko u Dafeti wamfuna u Thixo ngenxa yomntwana lowo; waza u Dafeti wenza inzilo wangena walala ubusuku bonke emhlabeni. Besuka abadala bendlu yakhe baya kuye ukuya kumsusa emhlabeni, kodwa akavuma, akadla nasonka nabo kanjako.

Kwathi ngomhla wesixhenxe umntwana wabhubha. Baza abendlu ka Dafeti boyika ukumxelela ukuba umntwana ubhubhile. Besithi ngexesha esaphilile umntwana sibesithetha naye, kodwa angasiphulaphuli: Sotsho njanina ke kuye, ukuthi: umntwana akasekho, ngenxa yokuba uyakuzenzakalisa. Kodwa wathi akubona u Dafeti besebezelana waseleqonda ukuba umntwana akasekho. Ngoko wathi kubo: akasekho na umntwana? Bathi bona: akasekho. Waphakama emhlabeni u Dafeti, wazihlamba, wathambisa walungisa izinxibo zake, wangena endlwini ka Yehova wabedesha. Wandula wangena endlwini yake, wathi akucela wabekelwa isonka wadla ke. Zaza izicaka zakhe zambuza ukuba kukuthinina oku, xa ebesaphila umntwana ube uzila ukutya, ulila nokulila; kodwa akuba umntwana engaseko, usuke wadla isonka, wathi yena ukuphendula: Nxa umntwana

ebesahleli ndazila ukutya ndalila nokulila, ngokuba ndibe ndisiti: Ngubanina owaziyo ukuba u Yehova angaba nofefe kum ukuba umntwana amphilise. Kodwa ngoku akaseko, sendiyakuzilela ntonina ke? Ndingaba nako na ukumbuyisa? Ndim oyakuya kuye, kodwa yena akasayi kubuyela kum.

Kodwa andithandi, bazalwana, ukuba ningabi nalwazi ngabo balele kukufa, ukuze ningabi nalusizi njengabantu abangenalo ithemba. Ngenxa yokuba thina siyakholwa ukuba u Yesu wafa, wabuya wavuka, kwangokunjalo abo balele kukufa ku Yesu, wothi u Thixo eze nabo kunye naye. Ngenxa yokuba oku sikutsho ngelizwi le Nkosi okokuba thina sisahleliyo, esilinde ukuza kwayo i-Nkosi, asisayi kubathintela abo balele kukufa. Ngenxa yokuba iyakuhla ngokwayo ivela ezulwini ngendanduluko, nangelizwi le ngelosi enkulu, nangexilongo lika Thixo; ukuze bathi abafele ku Yesu bavuke kuqala. Sandule ukuthi thina sisaphilileyo, sikhoyo, sithatyathelwe kubo emafini, ukuya ku khawulela i-Nkosi esibhakabhakeni, sibe ngokunjalo sesi yakuba kunye ne Nkosi. Ngako oko, yonwabisanani ngalamazwi.
Yothi lenkonzo ivulwe ngeculo. Emva kwalo ibe yintshumayelo phambi kwama Gosa ne Bandla lonke, okanye kwenziwe lomthandazo ulandelayo:

Thixo omkhulu, onobungcwalisa, ongu-Kumkani waphakade, ongophilileyo, nongabonakaliyo. okuphela ko Thixo owaziyo onembeko nobungcwalisa kude kuse emaphakadeni! Okhoyo kuzo zonke indawo ngexesha nye, nobonisayo ukufezeka kwemisebenzi yakhe: Nanku, sizokuzithoba phambi kwakho ngenxa ka Yesu Krestu u Mthetheleli wethu, no Mkhululi wethu ukuba sinako ukuzisondeza esihlaweni sakho ngaye nokuba sibe sinako ukubiza ngokuba ungu Thixo wethu, nokukuthandaza sikuthabatha njengo Bawo wethu. Siyakubulela ukuba sibe sinako ukuhlanganisana apha ngelixesha phakathi kwezimeko ezizele lufefe lwakho, ukuba sibenako ukubeka i-Litye esakhiweni sendlu ezakumiselwa udumo lwakho nezakungcwaliselwa ukunqulwa kokuphela ko Thixo ophilileyo noyinyaniso, ongu Yise, ongu Nyana, nongu Moya Oyingcwele. Sikuthandaza ngenyaniso ukuba usondele kuthi njengo Thixo wo-Thando, usithamsanqelise nogbukho bakho. Wenze ukuba

oko kusihlanganise apha kwamkeleke kuwe. zithi izenzo zalomsebenzi singawo apha, uzamkele, uzithamsanqele wena. Ngokwenjenje oku sibonisa ukuba asinto ngaphandle kwakho, ngako sizama ukumisa indlu yokuthandazela kuyo, sicela ukuba kungabikho nto iyenye ingena ngaphakathi kwentliziyo zethu ngayo ngaphandle kwale. Sithi mawuzenze ingcingane zethu ukuba zibe msulwa nenjongo zethu zimele ukuphakanyiswa kobungcwalisa bakho, noguquko lwaboni. Wanga ungasisikelela, usambathise ngenceba yakho.
Xolela izono zethu, uncede ubuthathaka bethu ngokuwamkela lo mthandazo wethu, ngenxaka Yesu Krestu, u-Msindisi wethu. Amen.

APHA KUNGAFUNDWA EZI-BHALWENI‚ÄîINDUMISO XCV. Okanye I. Cor. III.
Okanye I King V. Okanye Haggai. 1-10. Ukuba intshumayelo zenziwe lomthandazo ungentla ungashiywa, Umhlawumbi nezi lesesho ezi ukuba kuyabonakala. Kodwa ke emva kweculo kuyakuthi kuqutywe lentelo ilandelayo:‚Äî

Njengokuba nikholwa ukuba yimfanelo, nelungelo lenu ukumbhedeshela endlwini ye nkonzo u Thixo, nikholelwa kanjako ukuba ninokubakha ubukumkani buka Yesu, nasekubeni ninako ukutsalela neminye imiphefumlo elusindisweni ngokwenjenjalo, kungoko ke enithe nithembela e-Thixweni nafikelela kwezizigqibo zokuba nakhe lendlu ye Nkonzo, enidibene apha ngoku ngedinga lokuba nibeke i-Litye layo. Nakubeni kungeko mthetho ka Thixo uninyanzelayo kwesisenzo, kodwa ngenxa yokukhokelwa kwenu yingqondo ekhanyiselweyo nifike nabona, naza naqonda ukuba oku kuyimfanelo yenu: nenza okulungileyo ngenene ngoko ukumanyana phezu kwesenzo esikhulu kangaka, enisenzela ithemba lokulungileyo ngenene ngoko ukumanyana phezu kwesenzo esikhulu kangaka, enisenzela ithemba lokulungiswa kwenu nabantwana benu.

Asinamathandabuzo ngoko ukuba oku nikwenza nise Moyeni ka Thixo nokuba ngesisenzo nibonisa ukuthanda kwenu i Ziyone ngenene, nokuba ningawathetha namazwi awathethwa ngu Mculi xa athi: "Hayi ukuba zintle Kwezindlu zakho Thixo wemikhosi! Umphefumlo wam uyazilangazelela, ewe ufuna ukuba seminqubeni yakho Yehova."
Sisoloko sifumana e-Lizwini lika Thixo amaxesha

amaninzi kuko intsingiselo kwi Litye le gumbi. Bonani, i-tsho i-Nkosi, ku Yisaiya, ndiyabeka e Ziyone i-Litye lesiseko, elilingiweyo eliyintloko yegumbi, elinyuliweyo, nelinqabileyo."..Kuma Efese.. u-mPostile uthi: Kwakhelwe phezu kwesiseko sabapostile, nabaprofite, abantloko yabo ingu Yesu Krestu. i-Litye le gumbi liba soloko likho esisekweni ekwakhelwa phezu kwaso isakhiwo. Indawo yalo eli-Litye ibasekudibaneni kwendonga ezimbini elithi lizibambe, lizidibanise. I-Litye begumbi kubekwa elinye phezu kwelinye; lonto yenziwa kuwo omane amagumbi esakhiwo. Amatye amagumbi ngoko maninzi, kodwa nxana ehlanganiswa kuthethwa ngawo njenge litye elinye. Laye elona likhulu, lihle, lomeleleyo, kunawo onke amanye kubekwa lona ngaphantsi, okanye ngaphezulu kwesiseko sodonga libe ngummeli wawo onke amanye amatye esiseko eso.

Elinjalo ke libizwa ngokuba li-Litye le gumbi, okanye yintloko ye gumbi. Ngako oko u Yesu Krestu ubizwa ngokuba sisiscko, ne Litye le gumbi kuso isakhiwokazi esikulu sobu Krestu. Lontoke ithetha ukuba usisiscko se Cawayakhe, athi ayigcine yomelele kangangokuba ingashukunyiswa nto, ide ibe nako ukufikelela kuzo zone imbombo zomhlaba; amalungu ayo awadibanise, awabophe ngomtya

wothando owomeleleyo nowenza ukuba babe banye abantu bakhe, ukuze yena abe bubungcwalisa be Tyalike, ngenxa yesimo sakhe esibaphakamisayo abalandeli bakhe ngemiyalelo yakhe, nangesizathu sokuba yena emsulwa entweni zonke. Ngako oko limfanele igama lokuba uli-"Litye le-gumbi Eliyintloko, Elinyuliweyo, neli-Nqabileyo" elixhasa yonke indlu yobu Krestu, ekungathi ngaphandle kwakhe uwe phantsi wonke umsebenzi wobu Krestu.

Ngokubeka i-Litye le gumbi ke nenza isenzo esisemhlotsheni: Niyazisa ukuba eso sisiqalo sokwakhiwa kwendlu enizimisele ngoncedo luka Thixo ukuba nize niyigqibe. Esisenzo ke sinethemba, siyavuyisa senza nezimvo ezimnandi nezivuyisayo sifanele ngoko ukubaluleka ngokwanele ukuba nayo imini enje ngale, kwakhona sisenzo esibonisa ukuba amandla ethu ase Thixweni. Yimfanelo ukuba sikuvume oko ngokuphandle ngokubonisa ngokumakhela indawo yokuzi cengela kwethu kuye. Ukuvuma okunjalo kumnika uzuko olumfaneleyo u Yehova, kusifundisa nathi ukumoyika osifaneleyo. "Ngaphandle kokuba u-Thixo ayakhe indlu fumana bezikhathaza abo bayakhayo". Yintetho ka Solomon le oyena ulumkileyo ko-Kumkani bakwa Sirayeli. Ozenzo
zithe ngokupumelela kwazo zamnika udumo olungapheliyo.

Kusilungele njengaye, ngamaxesha onke, ukuwazi amandla, nolwazi olukhulu, nobungcwalisa bolawulo luka Thixo sizazi ukuba sizizidalwa zakhe ezibuthathaka, ezikhangele kuye ukuphila kwazo. Impumelelo yoko sikwenzayo yenziwa nguye, ngoko imbeko mayibe kuye ngawo onke amalinge esiwaphumezayo. Xana u Dafeti wayefuna ukumakhela indlu u Yehova wala: wathi: "Ndinyule unyana wakho ukuba andakhele indlu". Masizithobe ngoko phambi kwakhe ngomthandazo.

O. Thixo, obukhulu bungaphezu kwezulu lamazulu! Ozalise lonke ihlabathi ngobukho bakho; okudunyiswa zingelosi nangabantu kungena kongeza nto ebungcwaliseni nasebukhosini bakho: Sikubhedhesha, sisazi ukuba imithandazo yethu akunakuyilahla ngenxa yokungafaneleki kwethu. Siyazi ukuba bazizigidi abantu abangqinayo ukuba wena uyayiva imithandazo uyiphendule nokuyiphendula. Sibulela ukuba wenze yabako i-Cawa apha emhlabeni, waza wayikhusela ezintshabeni zayo, waza wenza ukuba isandi se gospile sivakale ezindlebeni zethu. Sibulela ne senzo sokuhlanganisela

kulendawo abo kakholwayo ku Yesu Krestu. Sinikela imibulelo yethu engameni lakho ngenxa yokuba ufake ezintliziyweni zabantu bakho ingcamango zokuba bakwenzele i tempeli yokuhlonitshwa kwegama lakho kulendawo; Apho igama lakho liyakuphakanyiswa khona, nalapho uyakuza kubathamsanqelisa khona abantu bakho. Sibulela ufefe lwakho olwenze ukuba ababantu bakhululeke, benze iminikelo, nezipho zabo kulomsebenzi omhle kangakanana. Wanga ungabenza ukuba baphakamise ilungelo labo lokuboleka i-Nkosi, bade nabaninzi babenako ukungena kulomsebenzi ongcwele bawusebenze kunye ngemvisiswano nangothando ide ibe nako ukugqitywa indlu yakho ime ingenatyala. Wanga umsebenzi ungafezeka kungabiko ngozi mntwini! Wanga umsebenzi oqaliweyo kulendawo ungakhokelwa zimvisiswano, ntliziyo ezimsulwa ezinokukhahlela pantsi umona, namakhwele, nalo lonke ulunya. Ukuze zithi ezizinto xa uzishenxisile, waza wayimisa le Ndlu yakho, uyenze ukuba izaliswe bubungcwalisa bakho ukuze kuthi xa kushunyayelwa ngawe kuyo ibe mininzi imiphefumlo enokusindiswa, ize ibe nako ukusiwa kulizwe lenyweba yakho engunaphakade. Wanga ungasamkela sonke njengabantu bakho obathengileyo ngo Yesu Krestu, waza waba ngcwalisa ngo Moya wakho;

Sikhokele ngobulumko bakho singabi sabanako ukwahlukana nofefe lwakho. Zonke ezizinto sizicela egameni nangenxa ka Yesu Krestu, i-Nkosi yethu, emakubeko kuye, naku Yise, naku Moya Oyingcwele udumo olungunaphakade. Amen.

Xa uthe wenziwa lomthandazo ungentla nokuba ngomnye ofana nawo, ilitye linokubekwa kakuhle. Umfundisi ophethe umsebenzi afake kwindawo elungiselelwe oko kulo amaphepha anoluhlu lwamagama abantu abenze iminikelo namagama ama-Gosa, nelo Mfundisi, ne Komiti yo-Kwakha nelo Mfundisi obe phethe umsebenzi ngalomini, nencwadi yemithetho ye Cawa, neyama Culo, ne-Bayibile, namagama eziphatha‚ÄîMandla ebu Rulumenteni ngoko, namagama amaphepha endaba ze Cawa ngoko, njalo njalo. Ekothi ke emveni koko umfundisi awusonge umsebenzi ngokwenza lamazwi alandelayo:‚Äî

Engameni lo-Thixo oziqu zithathu, ongu-Yise, ongu Nyana, ongu Moya Oyingcwele, sibeka eli-Litye ukuba libe siseko sendlu yokuthandaza enkonzweni yakhe. Ekwenzeni oku sivuma ukuba yena ungonamandla onke, nokuba u Krestu Yesu yena nguye i-Litye elikhulu le gumbi le Cawa yakhe nesiseko salo lonke ithemba losindiso lwanamhla kude kuse emaphakadeni. Wanga u Thixo walo lonke ufefe angasiva, ngokuwungcwalisa lomsebenzi
wethu ukuze ekugqibeleni asamkele ngenxa yo Nyana wothando lwakhe. Oyi Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu. Amen.

I Bishop, umhlawumbi umfundisi xa i Bishop ingeko, kunye nabanye abefundisi, bayakuhlangatyezwa emnyango wendlu ye Cawa zi Turstees, nama Gosa naba khokeli abayakwamkela i bishop, umhlawumbi umfundisi kunye na banye abefundisi, egameni lika Thixo, banikele e Bishopini okanye kumfundisi, izitshixo zendlu ye Cawa, ezoba ngumqondiso wenyaniso wokuba bayakuthi lonke ixesha emveni koko bahlale ngokuzithoba pantsi komthetho, nemfundiso, no lawulo lwe African Methodist Episcopal Church: nokuba bayakuthi ngawo onke amaxesha emveni koku bavumele abefundisi nabashumayeli balocawa, ukushumayela kuyo ilizwi elingcwele lika Thixo, Emveni koko bayakungena bahambele pambili behamba befunda lendumiso, i Bishop, okanye umfundisi aqale ngeyokuqala bonke abanye bathathe elandelayo, njalonjalo.
Hai ukuthandeka kwezindlu zakho. Yehova wemikosi!
Umphefumlo wam ungxamele ukungena emakhusini ka Yehova: Intliziyo yam, nenyama yam zigcobele ku Thixo ophilileyo.
Intakana ifumene ikhaka, inkonjane zifumene indlu, apho izalela khona amathole ayo; kwa izibingelelo zakho, Nkosi yemikhosi Kumkani wam, Thixo wam.
Hayi inyweba yabahlala endhlini yakho: bayakuhlala bekubonga.
Hayi inyweba yomntu omandla akuwe okhumbula umendo oya e Tsiyone.
Bephumelele entilini ebarileyo, bayenze ibe nemithombo: ewe imvula iyivathisa ngamathamsanqa.
Baya besomelela ngokomelela: babonakala bonke phambi ko Thixo wemikhosi, yiva umthandazo wam wubekele indlebe Thixo ka Yakobi.
Khangela, Thixo Khaka lethu; bukhangele ubuso bomthanjiswa wakho.
Inene imini enye endlwini yakho, ilungile kune waka: Ndinga ndingaba ngumgcina mnyango endlwini ka Thixo wam, kunokuhlala ezintenteni zenkohlakalo.
Ngokuba i-Nkosi u Thixo ililanga, ili khaka: i-Nkosi inika ufefe nozuko; ayiyikubavimba nto ilungileyo abahamba ngokufezekileyo.
Wena Nkosi yemikhosi: hayi inyweba yomntu othembela kuwe!
Apha i Bishop, okanye umfundisi kunye nabo bakhethelwa ukuncedisa bothatha indawo zabo ngaphakathi kwe pulpiti, abanye bahlale emacaleni: I Kwayala yothi ivume le Ndumiso.

Ndavuya bakuthi kum: Masiye endhlini ye Nkosi. Inyawo zethu zafika zema emasangweni akho Yerusalem. Yerusalem wena wakhiweyo: ngokomzi ohlangeneyo wamnye. Apho zinyukela ziye khona izizwe ze Nkosi: Ibungqina ke lonto kwa Sirayeli ukuba kubulelwe kwigama le Nkosi. Kuba khona apho kumiswe i-terone zokugweba: i-trone zendlu ka Davide, Celelani i Yerusalem uxolo: Mababe namathamsanqa abakuthandayo. Malube luxolo phakathi kwe ndoga zakho: ibe ngamathamsanqa ezindhlini zakho ezintle. Ngenxa yabazalwana nabalingane bam: makhe ndithethe uxolo ngawe. Ngenxa yendlu ye Nkosi u-Thixo wethu: ndiyakufuna okokulungileyo.
I Bishop, okanye umfundisi eguqile uyakwenza lomthandazo:

Yehova, Thixo wo Sirayeli! Akukho onje ngawe u Thixo, ezulwini pezulu naphantsi pezu komhlaba. Ogcinela izicaka zakho, ezihambayo phambi kwakho ngayo yonke intliziyo yazo, ucebano, nobubele. Kodwa u-Thixo angahlala ngenyaniso na emhlabeni. Bona ke izulu nezulu lamazulu alingekulingani; kungaba kangakananina ke lendlu esikwakhele yona. Uze ubeke ngakuwo umthandazo wezicaka zakho, nangakuzo izikhungo zazo; Yehova, Thixo wethu uphulaphula isikhalo nomthandazo ezithandaza ngawo izicaka zakho phambi kwakho namhla: ukuba amehlo akho abe evulekile phezu kwale ndlu emini nasebusuku, phezu kwalendawo othe ngayo igama lam loba khona; ukuba uphulaphule izitaruziso zezicaka zakho, nezabantu bakho o Sirayeli, xa bayakuthandaza kulendawo; uve wena use zulwini endaweni yakho yokuhlala uthi wakuva uxolele, ukuba kute kona umntu ngakuye umzalwana wakhe, waza wafunyanwa enetyala, laza elotyala laziswa phambi kwakho kulendlu yiva ngoko usezulwini wenze uzilungise izicaka

zakho, umgwebe okhohlakeleyo, ngokunika indlela yakhe phezu kwentloko yakhe; umgwebele olungileyo ukunika njengobulungisa bakhe. Xa abantu bakho o Sirayeli bebethwa phambi kotshaba, ngokuba bonile ngakuwe, baze babuye kuwe, balidumise igama lakho. bathandaze, bakutaruzise kulendlu; yiva ngoko usezulwini. uxolele izono zabantu bakho o Sirayeli ubabuyisele elufefeni lwakho, naseluthandweni lwakho. Xa izulu livalekile, ingeko imvula, ngokuba bonile ngakuwe: ukuba bathandaza kulendawo, balidumisa igama lakho, baza baguquka ezonweni zabo, wakuba ubabandezele; yiva ngoko wena usezulwini, usixolele isono sezicaka zakho, nesabantu bakho o Sirayeli, ubafundise indlela yakho elungileyo abayakuhamba ngayo uze unise imvula phezu kwelizwe elo ulinikeleyo, kubantu bakho, ukuba libe lilifa. Xa kuthe kwakho indlala elizweni kwabakho isifo esibhubhisayo, isaqhwithi esitshabalalisayo, isifo sezithombo, inkumbi, uruxeshe; xa intshaba zabo zibavingcela elizweni labo, xa kubakho imbubo nokuba sisifo esinjanina; konke ukuthandaza, nazo zonke izitaruziso eziyakwenziwa apha, nokuba ngubanina, nokuba ngabo bonke abantu bakho o Sirayeli‚Äîabayakuba besazi omnye nomnye isifo sentliziyo yakhe‚Äîbaza ngoko bazolulele izandla zabo kuyo lendlu; yiva ngoko usezulwini lakho.

uxolele wenze, unike komnye nomnye njengendlela zakhe konke. njengokwazi intliziyo zabo, ukuze bakoyike yonke imihla yokuphila kwabo. Kananjalo ngaye owezinye izizwe ongenguye owabantu bakho o Sirayeli, kodwa evela kwelikude ilizwe ngenxa yegama lakho: xa ayakuza athandaze kulendlu, yiva wena usezulwini endaweni yakho yokuhlala, umenzele lowo kangangoko abiza kuwe ngako: ukuze bonke abantu belizwe balazi igama lakho bakoyike wena, njengabantu bakho o Sirayeli: kananjalo ukuze bazi ukuba lendlu esiyakhileyo. ibizwa ngegama lakho. Xa abantu bakho bnile ngakuwe ngokuba kungeko mntu ongoniyo, uthi wena ubaqumbele ngoko, ukuba ngaba bayazikhumbuza baguquke baze benze izitaruziso zabo kuwe, besithi sonile, senzile ngobugwenxa, senza okukohlakeleyo; baza ke ngoko baguqukela kuwe ngayo yonke intliziyo yabo; nangawo wonke umphefumlo wabo, uze uve usezulwini endaweni yakho yokuhlala, ubaxolele abantu bakho abonileyo ngakuwe. nazo zonke izigqitho zabo abagqithileyo ngakuwe ngazo, ngokuba bayakuba ngabantu bakho nelifa lakho. olithenge ngegazi elinqabileyo lo-Nyana wakho u Yesu Krestu, i-Nkosi yethu: Kuye na Kuwe naku Moya Oyingcwele makubeko udumo. nokubongwa. namandla emhlabeni nasezulwini. AMEN.

Ke ngoku, Thixo ophezu konke, wena izulu lamazulu lingekulingani sikwahlulela lendlu, ukuba ibe yeye Nkonzo yakho; yamkele, sikucela ngokuzithoba, yithabathele kuwe, uze uyabele phakathi kwe cawe zakho ezingcwele, ezisemhlabeni, ukuba ubukho bakho, nobo Nyana wakho u Yesu Krestu kwanobo Moya wakho Oyingcwele, bube soloko buyizalisile lendlu esiyakhileyo, siyibiza ngegama lakho elingcwele; ukuze kuthi ngalo lonke ixesha eyakushunyayelwa ngalo ivangeli kulendlu ihle ngabo bonke ubungcwalisa bayo, ngamandla okukhanyisela intliziyo zabangaguqukileyo, baguqulwe ebumyameni, baziswe ekukhanyeni bakhutshwe nasemandleni esono naka sathana, beze ku-Thixo ukuze amandla okungcwaliswa kwalendlu ahlale emiphefumlweni yabo bakholwayo, ekubeni beyisusile iminqweno, namatemba nentando zabo kwezasemhlabeni, bayibhekise ezulwini, baze bazikhokele zibuye igusha ezilahlekileyo zendlu ka Sirayeli bazingenise kubo ubuhlanti bobomi obungunaphakade. Amen.

Siphulaphule, Bawo onofefe, usiphe okokuba bathi abazakunikelwa kuwe ngobaptizesho kulendlu bazuze inzaliseko yofefe lwakho, benziwe amalungu anomsebenzi ebandleni lakho ukuze ekugqibeleni bazuze ukonwaba okukhulu kunye ne Bandla eloyisileyo, ngaye u Yesu Krestu. Amen.

Siphulaphule, Bawo onofefe, wenze, usiphe ukuba bathi abo siyakuthabatha nabo umzimba wo Msindisi, ne Gazi lakhe elaphalalayo baze nabo banyaniseke ngalo ukholo lokuba ngenyaniso uli Xhwane lika Thixo elisusa izono zelizwe, ukuze bathi bezalwe ngokutsha bengcwalisiwe, beme bengenachaphaza, bevathisiwe ngobobomi kweso kunene sakho, kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.

Mawusive, wena owathenjiswa ibandla, usiphe okokuba bathi abo bayakuhlanganiswa kulendlu emtshatweni ongcwele baze nabo baphile, njengo Isaka no Rebeka, benjenjalo emigcobeni emsulwa ngokuvana bencedana omnye nomnye ukusana ezulwini, bebondla abantwana babo ukuze babe nodumo nomsebenzi kobubomi bukhoyo, babondlela lobomi obuzayo ngaye uYesu Krestu iNkosi Yethu. Amen.

Wena ophakamileyo, Oyingcwele ka Sirayeli, yamkela siyakucela, imithandazo yezicake zakho usiphe okokuba bathi bonke abayakuzivuma izono zabo kulendlu, okanye baphakamise amazwi abo ngendumiso nangemibulelo, ngenxa yezibele ezidlulileyo okanye ngenxa yenzuzo abazamkeleyo, banga bangagcoyiswa kukukhanya kobuso bakho, babe noxolo olugqitisileyo kuko konke ukuqonda novuyo olungathethekiyo oluzele lulo lonke udumo. Amen.

Wena Oyintloko ye Bandla! Siyakukhunga ukuba usive, usiphe, okokuba athi lowo oyakukhethelwa wena kulendlu, okanye abekwe ubungcwele azuze ukuthambisa ko Moya wakho, ahambe kuyo inzaliseko, yethamsanqa le Vangeli: ukushumayela ubutyebi bayo, obungapheli kuphengululwa kwelilizwe elonakeleyo; ke baze bathi begqibile nje ugqatso lwabo balwa ukulwa, balugcina ukholo bafumane isithsaba sobomi, balulawule kunye nawe, kude kube ngunaphakade. Amen.

Wena Thixo wabathunyelwe ezizweni! Siphulaphule wenze okukuba ithi imfihlakalo yogqatso lokuhanjiswa kwelizwi, kunye nazo zonke imfundiso zobu Krestu, zibe nokufumana kulendlu intsikelelo ngenxaso eyaneleyo; ukuze zibe nokunikelwa izixhobo zokukawulezisa lomini xa ubukumkani be lizwe, buyakuba bubukumkani be Nkosi yethu u Yesu Krestu. Amen.

Ngokunjalo ke siyahlulela wena lendlu, wena ohlala emazulwini, yamkele; yamkele phakathi kwendawo zakho ezingcwele ezisemhlabeni: wenze ukuba bathi bonke abayakuthandaza apha nge Sabatha, nangezizukulwana ngezizukulwana, kwanabantwana, babantwana bethu babe nokuva ngenyaniso ukuba le yindlu ka Thixo, ne sango le zulu. Amen.
Makuvunywe iculo, emva koko ibe yinthsumayelo; emva kwayo yiminikelo emva kwayo liculo nomthandazo kugqitywe ngofefe.

(Indlu evulwe ngoluhlobo, akukho mfundisi unokwenza nayi phina into kuyo ngaphandle kwenkonzo ezingcwele zika Thixo kuphela. Ukuba uwapule lomthetho woha netyala lokwaphula umthetho, amiswe ebufundisini bakhe.)
